Das Bett war für unsere Verhältnisse etwas zu hart. Dennoch war es wirklich ein Traum. Joel war super nett beim Schreiben und in der Kommunikation sehr zuverlässig. Würde jederzeit wiederkommen. ☺️✨

localizedReview.comments: The place picked me up so incredibly. It was really nice & I felt like I was in paradise. 😍 The parking was really very full but after a wait we got one. comments:

localizedReview.comments:
A little piece of heaven. It was wonderful. You can put things in the common fridge, it's very convenient.

comments:
Truly magical spot, you can simply spend your time by looking around and realizing where you are.

Joel fue muy amable y atento. Me ayudó con el traslado del equipaje que era pesado en un lugar que requiere bajar o subir escaleras. Recomiendo mucho este lugar para sentirse en casa en un entorno hermoso y tranquilo.

localizedReview.comments: Joel was very kind and attentive. He helped me with the luggage transfer that was heavy in a place that requires going down or up stairs. It helped me understand how to access the place that has particular conditions because the parking lot is somewhat removed from the place of the accommodation. She is a very kind and friendly person. I highly recommend this place to feel at home in a beautiful and quiet environment.

comments: Aussicht von der Wohnung aus ist einsame klasse. Der Sonnenuntergang ist absolut magisch. Für 1-2 Nächte ist es eine ideale Erfahrung.

comments: Amazing view and place!

comments: Un logement juste incroyable ! Je vous recommande si vous passez à Masca. C’était le plus beau airbnb que j’ai fait de toute ma vie. La vue est juste folle. Le logement est très paisible.

comments:
Accueil chaleureux et familial qui fut agréable mais qui nous a un peu empêcher de profiter pleinement de la terasse avec sa vue splendide en toute intimité. L’accès au frigo pour y déposer vos provisions est très appréciable. Je conseille tout de même l’endroit pour sa vue incroyable et son rapport qualité prix.

localizedReview.comments:
Warm and family welcome that was pleasant but which prevented us from enjoying the terrace to the fullest with its splendid view in privacy. The room is correct, access to the bathroom is through the terrace and is to be shared with the owners, slightly lack of cleanliness...
The access to the fridge to place your supplies is much appreciated. I still recommend the place for its incredible view and value for money.

comments: amazing place with great views and calm atmosphere💓

comments:

comments: It's an extremely cute special crafting house and with heart-warming host. It's surrounding  by mountains and with great sea view. The little village there provided the  great energy to us. Only small thing  is the bed is not most comfortable one, it's quite a hard surface to sleep on for us, and it's uneven in the middle (2 single beds combined).

Прекрасное место вдали от шума. Хозяин очень приветливый, ощущение домашность. Невероятно прекрасно было встретить рассвет с чудесным видом ! Мне приготовили чай . Это был прекрасный  опыт!  Вернусь еще обязательно !

localizedReview.comments: Lovely spot away from noise. The host is very friendly, it feels homey. It was incredibly wonderful to watch the sunrise with a wonderful view ! I had tea . It was a wonderful  experience!  I'll definitely be back!

comments: Fantastic place and the most stunning terrace and view. Joel wasn’t there, but communication was good, and his uncle José and Elizabeth are the kindest and warmest people. We wasn’t even planning on staying there, but ended up booking one night because our other place didn’t have room. Now I wish we stayed for longer. Will definitely come back!! We loved every second. Thanks a lot :)
Si le paradis existe, cet endroit doit en faire partie. Le frère de Joël nous a accueilli chaleureusement, tout était parfait!

localizedReview.comments: If paradise exists, this place should be a part of it. Joel's brother welcomed us warmly, everything was perfect!

comments: I mean wow, I just can’t even put into words how magical this place is. Was the drive to get there insane, yep. Glad I came in around 4/4:30 so it was a little less clustered. I got a spot immediately but that was pure luck. The road coming in is so steep, and tour buses are coming at you and you have to just take a deep breath. But once you make it and you get to the house you forget about it. Got to watch the sunset in perfect time and drank coffee with Jose and his partner Isabel (I think I’m remembering it right). Don’t miss out on the chance to see this part of the world, respect it and cherish it. What a beautiful place, hope I’m back one day.
Très bien!

localizedReview.comments: Awesome!

comments: Accueil sympa de José, qui nous a même fait goûter un plat venezuelien. Belles personnes au grand cœur, dans un bel écrin de paradis

localizedReview.comments: Nice welcome from José, who even made us taste a Venezuelan dish. Beautiful people with a big heart, in a beautiful setting of paradise

comments: Nous avons passés 1 nuit pendant nos vacances et tout était parfait. Nous avons adorés voyager à travers Masca et cela restera sans aucuns doutes, le meilleur logement de nos vacances. Nous avons pu nous déconnecter du monde grâce aux paysages incroyables qu’offre le logement et nous avons pu faire la connaissance de José et sa femme qui sont des personnes extraordinaires. Nous n’oublierons jamais ses personnes alors merci pour tout et à bientôt !

localizedReview.comments: We spent 1 night during our vacation and everything was perfect. We loved traveling through Masca and it will undoubtedly remain the best place to stay of our holiday. We were able to disconnect from the world thanks to the incredible scenery that the home offers and we were able to meet José and his wife who are extraordinary people. We will never forget his people so thank you for everything and see you soon!

comments: Wir sind zu zweit nach Masca gefahren und waren von der Umgebung sehr überzeugt. Das AirBnB ist in schöner Lage am Hang zu finden. Von der Straße aus liegt das Haus talwärts mit einem besonderen und einzigartigen Blick. Das Zimmer war sauber mit bequemen Bett.

localizedReview.comments: We drove to Masca as a couple and were very convinced of the surroundings. The AirBnB can be found in a beautiful location on the slope. From the road, the house is located down the valley with a special and unique view. The room was clean with comfy bed.

comments: Überragender Blick über Masca. Joel’s Onkel und dessen Freundin (mit denen man sich die Unterkunft teilt) sind sehr herzliche und liebe Menschen.

localizedReview.comments: Superior view over Masca. Joel's uncle and his girlfriend (with whom you share the place) are very warm and dear people.

comments: Joel y José personas muy amables y generosas y chicha la gata más cariñosa que he conocido en general todo fantástico y con un paisaje que enamora, sin duda volveremos

localizedReview.comments: Joel and José very kind and generous people and chicha the most loving cat I have met in general, everything fantastic and with a landscape that falls in love, we will definitely return

Wir kommen gerne wieder! Danke an Joel und José! :)

localizedReview.comments: It is a great place to stay in a very nice location. Masca offers beautiful nature, but you have to feed yourself. We will be happy to come back! Thanks to Joel and José! :)

comments: L'alloggio è fantastico, con una vista unica. José è stato adorabile, sicuramente ritorneremo qui💜

localizedReview.comments: The place is great, with a unique view. José was adorable, we will definitely come back here💜

comments:

localizedReview.comments: A parenthesis that feels good! What a view! Thank you again for everything, very nice to be able to connect with José.

comments: Der Aufenthalt bei Joel und seinem Onkel José war sehr schön! José hat uns sehr liebevoll empfangen und immer darauf bedacht, dass es uns gut geht. Er war sehr gastfreundlich und herzlich, so dass wir uns direkt wohl gefühlt haben. Das Zimmer entsprach der Beschreibung und alles war sauber. Besonders die Terrasse mit dem tollen Ausblick war schön und lud zum Entspannen auf den Hängematten ein. Das kleine Restaurant im Ort mit authentischer Küche ist sehr zu empfehlen. Von der Unterkunft aus kann man außerdem schöne kleine Wanderungen machen. Wir würden jederzeit wieder hierher kommen!

localizedReview.comments: The stay with Joel and his uncle José was very nice! José welcomed us very lovingly and always made sure that we are well. Especially the terrace with the great view was beautiful and invited you to relax on the hammocks. The small restaurant in the village with authentic cuisine is highly recommended. You can also make nice little hikes from the property. We would come back here anytime!

comments: It was great experience, excelent place

Nous sommes un couple de francais, guidés par Joël jusqu'au cocon grâce à ses explications. Nous avons été chaleureusement accueilli par l'oncle de Joël se nommant José et ainsi que sa compagne, sans oublier Chicha et Rocky 🐾
Malgré la barriere de la langue, nous avons enormement echangé que ce soit en Anglais , Espagnol ou comme on pouvait. Nous allons garder un très beau souvenir de ces personnes, du lieu et des moments passés là bas.
Nous reviendrons avec plus de base d'Espagnol pour dialoguer avec ces belles personnes et partager à 100% cette expérience! Mille merci.
Océane & Romuald.

localizedReview.comments:
We are a French couple, guided by Joel to the cocoon thanks to his explanations. We were warmly welcomed by Joel's uncle named José and his partner, not to mention Chicha and Rocky 🐾
Despite the language barrier, we hugely exchanged either in English , Spanish or as we could. We will keep a very nice memory of these people, the place and the moments spent there.
We will come back with more Spanish base to dialogue with these beautiful people and share this experience 100%! Thank you.
Océane & Romuald.

comments: Great place, pretty quiet, very friendly hosts & neighbors, shared bathroom, stunning views, very special restaurant Casa Riquelme around the corner, good start for walks and hiking.
A unique place in a unique location. enjoyed the stars
Incredible house in Masca, with an awesome view. José and his wife are really welcoming. Would recommend 200% !

Die Unterkunft sieht aus wie auf den Fotos! Das Zimmer ist sauber, ebenso das Badezimmer. Dieses teilt man sich mit José und den anderen Gästen. Die Küche darf man auf Anfrage benutzen und reicht auf jeden Fall aus um einfach zu Kochen. Es waren noch zwei weitere Gäste in einem anderen Zimmer, aber davon hat man nichts mitbekommen.
Eine Wunderschöne Sicht auf Masca und den Sternenhimmel bei Nacht- einfach toll! José und seine Frau Elizabeth waren super gastfreundlich und wir hatten einen tollen Aufenthalt. Die Lage ist sehr ruhig, mitten im Masca Valley, und definitiv nur mit dem Auto zu erreichen. Ich würde jederzeit wiederkommen!

localizedReview.comments:
The place looks like the photos! The room is clean, as is the bathroom. This is shared with José and the other guests. The kitchen can be used on request and is definitely sufficient to simply cook. There were two more guests in another room, but you didn't notice it.
A beautiful view of Masca and the starry sky at night - just great! José and his wife Elizabeth were super hospitable and we had a great stay. The location is very quiet, in the middle of the Masca Valley, and definitely only accessible by car. I would come back anytime!

comments:
Wir hatten eine schöne Zeit bei Jose. Der Ausblick und das Ambiente dort ist traumhaft!

localizedReview.comments:

comments: Abbiamo passato una bellissima notte a Masca nell'alloggio di Joel e dello zio José. Ci ha accolto proprio José e fin da subito si è dimostrato super gentile e soprattutto molto ospitale, ci ha mostrato dove trovare la camera, bagno e cucina e ci ha fatti sentire a casa. L'arredamento ricorda molto un luogo antico e riesce a farti immergere nella Masca più realistica😊, inoltre c'è una vista incredibile e si vedono bellissimi tramonti. Ne vale proprio la pena!! La mattina inoltre José ci ha dato il buongiorno offrendoci anche un ottimo caffè 😊👍🏼 Super super consigliato!!

localizedReview.comments: We had a beautiful night in Masca at Joel and Uncle José's place. We were welcomed by José and from the beginning he was super kind and above all very hospitable, he showed us where to find the room, bathroom and kitchen and made us feel at home. The decor is very reminiscent of an ancient place and manages to immerse you in the most realistic Masca😊, there is also an incredible view and you can see beautiful sunsets. It's worth the trip!! In the morning José also gave us a good morning and also offered us a great 😊👍🏼 super recommended coffee!!

comments: Nuitée à Masca dans le logement de Joel (chambre privée - salle de bain et terrasse partagée) très agréable, au calme dans un environnement magnifique.

comments:
Wir haben es geliebt!
Jose und seine Frau haben uns ganz herzlich aufgenommen und uns sofort alles erklärt! Die beiden sind herzensgute Menschen und es scheint sie zu freuen Gäste zu haben! comments: Don’t even think—just book it!  This place has the most beautiful location of any place I have ever stayed, and it is perfectly silent and peaceful.  We were greeted so warmly and felt right at home.  We really can’t recommend it strongly enough—this was a special place.
Très bel endroit, chambre très sympa, hôtes très accueillants.

localizedReview.comments: Very nice place, very nice room, very welcoming hosts.

comments:
Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit in der Unterkunft und wurden sehr herzlich und freundlich empfangen.
Die Unterkunft ist definitiv das Geld wert. Von der Terasse aus hat man einen schönen Ausblick auf die Masca Schlucht.
Einziger Nachteil wäre die Lage, da es tagsüber schwierig ist, einen Parkplatz zu finden. Morgens und abends ist das aber kein Problem, wenn man das also in seiner Tagesplanung beachtet, ist der Parkplatz damit kein Problem.

localizedReview.comments:
We had a very nice time in the accommodation and were received very warmly and kindly.
The place is definitely worth the money. From the terrace, you have a beautiful view of the Masca Gorge.
The only downside would be the location as it is difficult to find a parking spot during the day. In the morning and evening, however, this is no problem, so if you pay attention to that in your daily planning, the parking space is no problem with that.
