localizedReview.comments: We loved our stay at this breathtaking place. José is a warm and sweet man and although he does not speak English, we were able to chat with the help of Google translating. We even got another cup of coffee on our last day. Highly recommended if you want to relax in a place where nature embraces you.

comments: Wir hatten eine sehr schöne Zeit bei José und seinen Haustieren. José ist sehr gastfreundlich. Der Ausblick war traumhaft, der kleine Ort in der Nähe tagsüber ziemlich voll. In der Unterkunft war es aber immer ruhig. Wir würden jederzeit wieder kommen.

localizedReview.comments: We had a very nice time with José and his pets. José is very hospitable. The view was fantastic, the small place nearby quite crowded during the day. But it was always quiet in the place. We would come back any time.

comments:
Charming location with breathtaking views and really nice house! I would love to stay there longer.
Joel was really helpful when we made a mistake with booking and saved us.
His uncle who hosted us had really positive vibe and was such a cheerful person.

Très bon séjour chez Joël et José dans un cadre exceptionnel.
Séjourner à Masca c'est apprécier le calme de la vallée et se couper de tout.
Je recommande fortement ce lieux pour les amoureux de nature et d'animaux.
Merci a José pour son accueil très chaleureux et à Joël pour les activités proposées ainsi que les suggestions de restaurant!

localizedReview.comments:
Very good stay with Joël and José in an exceptional setting.
Staying in Masca means enjoying the quietness of the valley and cutting off from everything.
I highly recommend this place for nature and animal lovers.
Thank you to José for his very warm welcome and to Joël for the activities offered as well as the restaurant suggestions!

comments:
Nous avons passé une nuit dans le logement de Joel. Tout était exactement comme dans la description. Jose, l'oncle de Joel, nous a accueilli avec beaucoup de gentillesse!
Merci beaucoup pour ce séjour !

localizedReview.comments:
We stayed one night at Joel's place Everything was exactly as in description. Jose, Joel's uncle, welcomed us with great kindness!
Thank you so much for your stay!

comments: Recordaré este alojamiento con cariño a pesar de que nos quedamos sólo una noche. Una auténtica casa canaria con unas vistas maravillosas, y un anfitrión muy hospitalario y simpático que respeta tu espacio o conversa contigo si te apetece. Sin duda volvería y recomiendo que visites Masca y te hospedes aquí, merece la pena.

localizedReview.comments: I will remember this place fondly even though we only stayed one night. An authentic Canarian house with wonderful views, and a very hospitable and friendly host who respects your space or converts with you if you like. I would definitely come back and recommend visiting Masca and staying here, it's worth it.

comments: One of the best airbnbs I’ve visited- located on the hillside of the pristine Masca village. The hosts were lovely and welcoming. If you like hiking be sure to reserve your permit for the trail to the coast in advance

When we arrived, Joel’s uncle and his girlfriend gave us a warm welcome. Their hospitality was heartwarming, so kind and loving people. Always in for a laugh and a good chat. The room was very clean and the view was incredible. Totally worth the visit!!!

Très bon accueil et bonnes indications pour venir
Le logement se situe dans un endrout magnifique
Lit très confortable

localizedReview.comments:
Very nice welcome and good directions to come
The accommodation is located in a beautiful endrout
very comfortable bed

comments:
Our stay in Masca was absolutely wonderful!
The hosts were fantastic—very communicative, helpful, and cheerful. The location, nestled away from the city, offered peace, beautiful nature, and tranquility. The night sky was stunning, with stars clearly visible.
Everything was spotless, with fresh linens and towels provided. The terrace was a highlight, featuring a charming table and a hammock, perfect for enjoying breakfast with breathtaking views.
We will definitely return!

We had an amazing stay at Joel’s place in Masca! Very peaceful and quiet with the most stunning views. Joel is a friendly and proactive host who even organized hiking permits for us! Highly recommend this place for a relaxing, authentic Masca experience. Thanks for everything, Joel!

J'ai passé 3 nuits dans ce logement qui permet de profiter pleinement de l'environnement magique de Masca
C'est assez difficile d'accès, compte tenu de la situation du lieu mais c'est pour cela qu'on la choisi. De beaux souvenirs, où on a pu voir les chèvres locales se balader dans la falaise en face de la terrase

localizedReview.comments:
I spent 3 nights in this place that allows me to fully enjoy the magical environment of Masca
It's quite difficult to access, given the location of the place but that's why we choose it. Beautiful memories, where we could see the local goats strolling through the cliff opposite the terrace

comments:
Unser Aufenthalt bei Jose war wirklich toll. Wir haben uns von Anfang an sehr wohl gefühlt und der Ausblick von der Terrasse aus ist wirklich unbeschreiblich schön. Sowohl die Küche als auch das Bad teilt man sich mit Jose, was bei uns reibungslos funktioniert hat. Jose ist sehr herzlich und man fühlt sich sehr willkommen. Man muss allerdings beachten, dass es in Masca keinerlei Einkaufsmöglichkeiten gibt (der nächste Minimarkt ist 15-20 Minuten mit dem Auto entfernt) und auch die paar Restaurants (schwierig für Veganer:innen) hatten abends leider nicht auf.
Generell haben wir unseren Aufenthalt in Masca sehr genossen und würden jederzeit wieder zu Jose kommen.

localizedReview.comments:
Our stay with Jose was really great. We felt very comfortable from the beginning and the view from the terrace is really indescribably beautiful. Both the kitchen and the bathroom are shared with Jose, which worked smoothly for us. Jose is very warm and you feel very welcome. However, it must be noted that there is no shopping in Masca (the nearest mini market is 15-20 minutes away by car) and also the few restaurants (difficult for vegans) unfortunately did not open in the evening.
In general, we enjoyed our stay in Masca and would come back to Jose at any time.

comments: We found the Airbnb easily thanks to the clear and detailed directions provided before our arrival. The location is stunning, and we were warmly welcomed by Joel's aunt and uncle, who offered us a cup of coffee upon our arrival. The breathtaking view and peaceful setting perfectly complement the house. As animal lovers, we were delighted to be greeted by Rocky, the little Yorkshire Terrier, and the affectionate cat who wished us good morning. We highly recommend this place for its hospitality, location, and tranquility. At night, the starry sky and profound silence are truly remarkable.

Hôte très agréable nous avons passé une super soirée dans un cadre merveilleux.
Je recommande les yeux fermés !
Merci pour tout.

localizedReview.comments:
Very nice host, we had a great evening in a wonderful setting.
I'd recommend it!
Thanks for everything.

comments: Emplacement idéal, vue à couper le souffle, les hôtes sont très gentils et accommodants. Les randonneurs seront ravis car les environs sont sublimes.

localizedReview.comments: Great location, breathtaking views, the hosts are very kind and accommodating. Hikers will be delighted as the surrounding area is sublime.

comments: El lugar te brinda la posibilidad de desconectar y disfrutar de la naturaleza. Es la opción perfecta si buscas tranquilidad. Además, el alojamiento cuenta con todos los servicios y tiene un encanto especial. Su anfitrión José fue muy amable y servicial.

localizedReview.comments: The place gives you the possibility to disconnect and enjoy nature. It is the perfect choice if you are looking for peace and quiet. In addition, the home has all the amenities and has a special charm. Her host Jose was very friendly and helpful.

comments:
Un vrai paradis sur Terre, nous avons été subjugués par ce logement qui dépassait toutes nos attentes.
La qualité de l’accueil était plus qu’au rendez vous et nous nous sentions chez nous.
Je souhaiterais y retourner sans hésiter !
Merci encore pour votre gentillesse

localizedReview.comments:
A real paradise on Earth, we were captivated by this place that exceeded all our expectations.
The quality of the welcome was more than at the rendezvous and we felt at home.
I would like to return without hesitation!
Thank you again for your kindness

comments: NAPIĘKNIEJSZE MIEJSCE W JAKIM MIAŁAM OKAZJE SIĘ ZATRZYMAĆ! <3 Nie ma słów, żeby opisać widok jaki się rozprzestrzenia z domku Joela. Nie mogłam się napatrzeć - jak z bajki. Taras, hamak, cisza i spokój, no po prostu cudnie. Na miejscu czysto i jest wszystko, czego potrzeba. Gospodarz przemiły człowiek, czuć od niego bijące ciepło. Był zawsze uśmiechnięty :) Mimo, że nie rozmawialiśmy w jednym języku, nie było najmniejszego problemu z zameldowaniem (samodzielne), Pan nas oprowadził, wszystko pokazał. Oceniam mój pobyt jako bardzo udany i jeśli będę jeszcze kiedyś na wyspie, to na pewno wybiorę ten nocleg. Znajomi już dopytywali o namiary, jak im pokazałam zdjęcia :)) Pozdrawiam Pana Gospodarza i bardzo polecam! :)))

localizedReview.comments: THE PLACE I WAS ABLE TO STAY! <3 There are no words to describe the view of Joel's cottage. I couldn't look - like a fairy tale. Patio, hammock, peace and quiet, just wonderful. The place is clean and has everything you need. The host is a lovely person, feeling warm from him. He was always smiling :) Even though we didn't speak one language, there was no problem with check-in (on your own), you showed us around, showed us everything. I rate my stay as a great one, and if I'm ever on the island again, I'll be sure to choose this place. My friends were already asking for directions, how I showed them the photos :)) Best regards, Your Host and I highly recommend! :)))

comments: I had an incredible stay at Joel’s place. The host was very communicative and the place was easy to find based on his instructions. The stay was absolutely magical - the location was unreal! Would recommend to anyone visiting Tenerife! Thank you Joel and Joel’s family.

Wyjątkowa lokalizacja, to najpiękniejsze miejsce, w jakim mieliśmy możliwość spędzić noc. Pokój bardzo przyjemny, stylowy, na zewnątrz hamak i stoliki - można spędzać czas z widokiem na góry i ocean. Możliwość skorzystania z dobrze wyposażonej kuchni. Komunikatywny gospodarz, przekazał dokładne wskazówki. Serdecznie polecamy każdemu, jeden dzień w tym pięknym miejscu to za mało.

localizedReview.comments: Unique location, it's the most beautiful place we had the opportunity to spend the night. The room is very nice, stylish, outside a hammock and tables - you can spend time overlooking the mountains and the ocean. Possibility to use a well-equipped kitchen. Communicative host, provided accurate guidance. We highly recommend it to anyone, one day in this beautiful place is not enough.

comments:
La location è incantevole, proprio nel cuore di Masca. Sembra di svegliarsi in un sogno, circondato dalla natura e dal silenzio. La stanza è molto carina, con bagno in comune e una bellissima terrazza con la possibilità di sdraiarsi con l’amaca.
Se avete la fortuna di conoscere Joel, è molto sorridente e disponibile ☺️
Super consigliato!!

localizedReview.comments:
The location is enchanting, right in the heart of Masca. It feels like waking up in a dream, surrounded by nature and silence. The room is very nice, with a shared bathroom and a beautiful terrace with the possibility of lying down with the hammock.
If you're lucky enough to meet Joel, he's very smiling and helpful
☺️Highly recommended!!

comments: Séjour extraordinaire la vue est a couper le souffle, le cadre est exceptionnel, nous n’avons manquer de rien, l’hôte est très réactif, je recommande a 100%

localizedReview.comments: Extraordinary stay the view is breathtaking, the setting is exceptional, we have not lacked anything, the host is very responsive, I recommend 100%

comments: Amazing place. I would recommend staying in Masca overnight as it absolutely calms down after all travelers leave. And this place was magic! ❤️

A ne pas passer à côté. lieu superbe tout y es pour ce détendre. nous avons vraiement adoré
Joël est très tees accueillant

localizedReview.comments:
Not to be missed. superb place everything is there for this relaxation. we really loved it
Joel is very welcoming

comments:
We had a great stay in this cute and original countryside house with a unique view! The house is very nicely renovated and still with its old charme. It was very clean, well equipped and really special to enjoy the calmness of nature. Surrounded by mountains with trails for hiking and a perfect view on the sunsets!
Joel is a very friendly and talkative person who recommended us a lot of things in the area and is always open for a nice chat.
We are hopefully coming back any time soon!

Joel è magnifico, cortese e il suo alloggio è davvero incredibile: completamente immerso nella natura. Consiglio di godersi le stelle in notturna su una delle amache presenti appena fuori la stanza, sul patio del mondo :)
Vale&Lu

localizedReview.comments: Joel is magnificent, courteous and his place is really incredible: completely surrounded by nature. I recommend enjoying the stars at night on one of the hammocks just outside the room, on the world's patio:) Vale&Lu

comments: un sitio increíble, volveremos

localizedReview.comments: an amazing place, we'll be back

comments:
Masca est magnifique, l'emplacement de la location est idéale.
Une petite chambre chez l'habitant qui fait parfaitement l'affaire. Une vue imprenable avec des hamacs, ce fut très reposant !

localizedReview.comments:
Masca is beautiful, the location of the rental is ideal.
A small room in a local home that does the perfect job. Amazing views with hammocks, it was very relaxing!

comments:
Mein Freund und ich waren vor zwei Jahren schonmal auf Teneriffa, diesmal wollten wir eher den Norden der Insel erkunden und sind auf dieses tolle Airbnb gestoßen.
Es ist etwas ganz anderes, die Lage ist außergewöhnlich. Man muss sich bewusst sein, dass man vom öffentlichen Parkplatz noch circa 10-15 min einen teilweise anstrengenden Weg zur Unterkunft zurücklegen muss. Wir empfehlen deshalb Rucksäcke, da die Wege nicht geteert sind. Bei den Parkplätzen muss man teilweise etwas auf diese warten, da tagsüber viele Touristen Masca besuchen.
Joel als Gastgeber war sehr freundlich, hat schnell auf Fragen geantwortet und uns einmal netterweise einen äußerst leckeren Kaffee zubereitet!
Wir hatten das einzelne Zimmer gebucht, dieses war sauber. Das zugehörige Badezimmer war größtenteils auch sauber, allerdings liegen sowohl im Badezimmer als auch in der Küche diverse Hinterlassenschaften früherer Gäste.
Die Aussicht von der Terrasse aus ist einzigartig! Wir würden das Airbnb wieder buchen.

localizedReview.comments:
My boyfriend and I were in Tenerife two years ago, this time we wanted to explore the north of the island and came across this great Airbnb.
It's something completely different, the location is exceptional. You have to be aware that you have to cover a partly strenuous path to the accommodation from the public parking lot for about 10-15 minutes. We therefore recommend backpacks, as the paths are not tarred. At the parking lots, you sometimes have to wait for them, as many tourists visit Masca during the day.
Joel as a host was very friendly, responded quickly to questions and kindly prepared us an extremely delicious coffee!
We had booked the single room, this one was clean. The associated bathroom was mostly clean, but both in the bathroom and in the kitchen there are various legacies of previous guests.
The view from the terrace is unique! We would book the Airbnb again.

comments: An awesome stay in a very peaceful village with amazing scenery. Joel left clear instructions on how to find the right place, and the lockbox was very convenient. Thank you!
Bardzo interesująca propozycja na krótki pobyt:)

localizedReview.comments: Very interesting short stay offer:)

comments: Joël est très accueillant nous a donné de super conseils et le logement est extrêmement bien placé facile d’accès, je vous conseille d’arriver vers 19h pour éviter le trafic en descendant.

localizedReview.comments: Joel is very welcoming gave us great advice and the accommodation is extremely well placed easy to access, I advise you to arrive around 7 p.m. to avoid traffic on the way down.

comments: Die perfekte Unterkunft für Ausflüge im Teno-Gebirge. Atemberaubende Aussicht auf die Masca-Schlucht 😄 Die Villa ist sehr schön, sauber und man fühlt sich gleich wie zuhause!

localizedReview.comments: The perfect place for excursions in the Teno mountains. Breathtaking views of the Masca Gorge 😄 The villa is very nice, clean and you feel right at home!

comments: Truly one of the most amazing places i’ve ever been! I am a sucker for a small, remote town in the mountains and this was beyond amazing! Felt like Joshua Tree CA if you’ve ever been. Place was so homey and loved every minute of it. The stars were fantastic! NOTE: it is most helpful to rent a car to get there

Joel was is a really good man , we were happy to talk with him for a while . He gave us good advice what to do in the Island and we felt like at home. We will for Sure come back , thank you for everything! It’s a great place to chill and hike. The best airbnb so far!
Has to be the best way to visit Masca. Probably the best airbnb I’ve stayed in. Joel’s a legend. Don’t think, just book.
Niesamowite widoki!

localizedReview.comments: Amazing views!

comments:
airbnb unico, posizione meravigliosa, un’esperienza da fare una volta nella vita per sentirsi nella natura e vedere un tramonto meraviglioso 😍
host fantastico e super accogliente

localizedReview.comments:
unique airbnb, wonderful location, a once in a lifetime experience to feel in nature and see a wonderful sunset 😍
great and super welcoming host

comments: Unique place to stay!
Muchas gracias, we  had a very pleasant stay in this lovely place with a great terrace and amazing nature views!!! We loved it🥰

Leider waren Küche und Badezimmer nicht ganz sauber. Das Schlafzimmer allerdings schon. Die Unterkunft war etwas schwer zu finden in dem kleinen, verwinkelten Ort. Man muss 10 min Fußweg vom öffentlichen Parkplatz zurücklegen.
Die Aussicht ist allerdings atemberaubend! Sehr ursprüngliche Unterkunft aber es steht einem eine Küche und sogar ein Grill zur Verfügung. Joel war äußerst hilfsbereit, hat immer schnell geantwortet und klare Informationen gegeben.

localizedReview.comments:
Unfortunately, the kitchen and bathroom were not quite clean. However, the bedroom is. The place was a little hard to find in the small, winding place. You have to walk 10min from the public parking lot.
However, the view is stunning! Very original place but there is a kitchen and even a grill available. Joel was extremely helpful, always responded quickly and gave clear information.

comments: The appartement is very special, and it is situated in the very beautiful area. The view from the terrace is spectacular :)

Solide Unterkunft mit schöner Terrasse. Nachdem die Tagestouristen den Ort verlassen haben, sind die Straßen wie leergefegt. Es gibt kaum Möglichkeiten, abends noch ein Restaurant zu finden. Spanischkenntnisse sind von Vorteil.

localizedReview.comments: Solid place with nice terrace. After the day tourists leave the place, the streets are swept away. There are hardly any ways to find a restaurant in the evening. Spanish skills are an advantage.
localizedReview.response:
Hi Maria, thank you for your evaluation, I am sorry that your experience has not been in the soul. We assume that people looking for rural environments will understand that there are some limitations such as less gastronomic offer, convenience services that are in very touristy places full of people. On the other hand, we highly value the tranquility, silence and harmony with nature, we find it much more valuable🙏.
Best regards
Joel

response:
Hola Maria gracias por tu evaluación, lamento que tu experiencia no haya calado en el alma. Suponemos que la gente que busca entornos rurales entenderá que hay algunas limitaciones como menos oferta gastronómica, servicios de comodidad que están en sitios muy turísticos repletos de gente. En cambio aquí valoramos mucho la tranquilidad el silencio y la armonía con la naturaleza, lo encontramos mucho más valioso 🙏.
Saludos cordiales
Joel

comments:
To było cudowne doświadczenie! Od razu poczuliśmy się jak w domu. Zostaliśmy przyjęci lampka wina. Pokój, taras i widok to po prostu czysta magia! Lepiej niż na zdjęciach. Wieczór i poranek w takim miejscu to niesamowite przeżycie. Masca w środku dnia jest bardzo komercyjna jednak po wyjeździe turystów którzy wpadają do wioski i wypadają miejsce robi ogromne wrażenie. Byliśmy zachwyceni!!!
Jedyny problem to parking, z racji tego, że miejsc publicznych jest niewiele, a chętnych bardzo dużo zaparkowanie może być kłopotliwe .

localizedReview.comments:
It was a wonderful experience! We felt right at home. We were welcomed a glass of wine. The room, the terrace and the view are just pure magic! Better than photos. Evening and morning in a place like this is an amazing experience. Masca in the middle of the day is very commercial, but after the tourists who come to the village and fall, the place is very impressive. We were delighted!!!
The only problem is parking, due to the fact that there are few public places, and it can be a pain to park a lot.

comments:
De kamer ligt in een heel oud nog verder te renoveren pand. Het is een drukke straat maar doordat de kamer aan de achterzijde aan de patio ligt heb je daar weinig last van het geluid. Heerlijk geslapen.
De gastheer woont ook in het gebouw maar je hebt veel privacy.
De gastheer is zeer behulpzaam en geeft veel tips, reageert vaak direct als je iets vraagt via de berichtenmodule airbnb.

localizedReview.comments:
The room is located in a very old building even further to be renovated. It is a busy street, but because the room is at the back of the patio, you won't be bothered by the noise. Slept wonderfully.
The host also lives in the building but you have a lot of privacy.
The host is very helpful and gives many tips, often responds directly if you ask anything via the airbnb message module.

comments:
Nos ENCANTÓ la estancia en este alojamiento que es único en su género. Nos pareció un cuento de hadas o la realidad del señor de los Anillos... Poca gente creo ha tenido el privilegio de poderse despertar en un lugar tan mágico y silencioso.
Fue todo perfecto, la posición inmejorable, el alojamiento muy peculiar y del diez, comunicarse fue muy fácil y el check-in super sencillo. Merece de verdad la pena ⭐💫 y creo hasta volveremos un día. En serio.
PS: no dejen de mirar las estrellas por la noche rodeados de este silencio que nos envuelve mágicamente.

localizedReview.comments:
We LOVED the stay at this home that is unique in its genre. We felt like a fairy tale or the reality of the Lord of the Rings... Few people I think have had the privilege of being able to wake up in such a magical and silent place.
Everything was perfect, the unbeatable position, the very peculiar accommodation and the ten, communicating was very easy and the check-in was super easy. It's really worth it ⭐💫 and I think we'll come back a day. Seriously.
PS: Don't stop looking at the stars at night surrounded by this magically enveloping silence.

comments: The view was surreal and I felt right at home! Highly recommend

Die Unterkunft bietet einen umbeschreiblich schönen Ausblick auf die Berge und das Meer. Wir haben viel Zeit auf der Terasse in den Hängematten verbracht. Die Katze des Hauses ist sehr zutraulich!
Das Zimmer war etwas kleiner als von den Bildern erwartet. Die Küche ist etwas unordentlich, aber erfüllt ihren Zweck. Das Bad ist sauber und hat ebenfalls einen schönen Ausblick auf die Berge.
Alles in allem sind wir sehr glücklich darüber in dieser schönen Unterkunft mit einem so tollen Ausblick angehalten zu haben!

localizedReview.comments:
The property offers an indescribably beautiful view of the mountains and the sea. We spent a lot of time on the terrace in the hammocks. The cat of the house is very intimate!
The room was a little smaller than expected from the pictures. The kitchen is a bit messy, but serves its purpose. The bathroom is clean and also has a nice view of the mountains.
All in all, we are very happy to have stopped in this beautiful accommodation with such a great view!

comments: Nice time in a beautiful place, nothing more to add.

Ich habe mich bei Joel sehr wohlgefühlt und konnte am nächsten Tag gestärkt in die Masca Schlucht begeben! Ich hatte nicht viel Zeut Joel kennenzulernen, da ich nur eine Naxht geblieben bin aber er ist ein sehr herzlicher Mensch und ich habe mich gefreut ihn und sein wunderschönes  Haus kennenzulernen.

localizedReview.comments: I felt very comfortable with Joel and was able to enter the Masca Gorge stronger the next day! I didn't have much to meet Joel as I only stayed a naxht but he is a very warm person and I was happy to meet him and his beautiful  house.

comments: We had a lovely time. Our accommodations were great as was our host Jose.
Sehr schöner Aufenthalt, die Aussicht ist traumhaft. Der Check-In hat komplikationslos geklappt. Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen.

localizedReview.comments: Very nice stay, the views are fantastic. Check-in went smoothly. We would come back out.

comments:
Nous avons vraiment adoré passer du temps à Masca et chez José qui est vraiment adorable, discret et bienveillant. Le cadre est incroyable, très dépaysant et relaxant. Pensez à vous garer en hauteur sur le parking au dessus de la maison. Une très belle expérience, nous reviendrons avec grand plaisir !
Merci beaucoup José pour votre si bon accueil !

localizedReview.comments:
We really loved spending some time in Masca and José's who is really adorable, discreet and caring. The setting is amazing, very exotic and relaxing. Consider parking at height in the parking lot above the house. A very nice experience, we'll be happy to come back!
Thank you very much José for your kind welcome!

comments:
We didn't ever meet Joel, but Josè (who lives there and we shared a shower room and modest kitchen with) greeted us warmly, despite us speaking very little Spanish.
The views were stunning and the place was very well positioned and looked after. Instructions to our room were very clear, it was a 10 minute walk from the parking, so my advice would be to pack light for that bit and leave what you dont need in the car.
We only stayed one night, but would very much recommend this place due to it's stunning location and Josè's hospitality.

Une expérience inoubliable à Masca grâce à Jose et Joel. La chambre offrait une vue époustouflante sur les montagnes environnantes, créant une atmosphère vraiment unique. Nous sommes reconnaissants d'avoir eu la chance de séjourner chez eux et nous recommandons vivement cette adresse à tous ceux qui veulent vivre l'authenticité de Masca 👍

localizedReview.comments: An unforgettable experience in Masca thanks to Jose and Joel. The room offered a breathtaking view of the surrounding mountains, creating a truly unique atmosphere. We are grateful to have had the chance to stay with them and we highly recommend this place to anyone who wants to experience the authenticity of Masca 👍

comments: Alles war super !

localizedReview.comments: Everything was great !

comments: As experienced Masca-visitors, we knew we signed up for the best treatment :) Reaching the place requires some workout but the overwhelming hospitality and care of Joseito will compensate you for everything. 100% recommended and we will surely return soon :)

Die Anfahrt auf der Serpentinenstrasse ist nicht so schwer, wenn man nach 17:00 unterwegs ist. Denn zu dieser Zeit gibt es keinen Busverkehr mehr. Wir waren rechtzeitig zum Sonnenuntergang im Appartement. Ein Traum!  Wegbeschreibung und CheckIn mit Schlüsselbox war perfekt. Rucksäcke sind als Gepäck ideal. Koffer auf dem Weg mit Kopfsteinpflaster sind nicht zu empfehlen. Das Apartment ist ein authentisches Steinhaus in Masca, sauber und herrlich gemütlich. Wir durften die Küche benutzen und dort auch Pfeffer,Salz, Essig und Öl verwenden...Unser Zimmer hatte zwar kein Fenster, aber in der  hölzernen Eingangstüre konnte man die obere Hälfte öffnen und somit als  "Fenster" umfunktionieren und auch über Nacht offen lassen. Am Morgen hat uns José einen feinen Kaffee serviert. Joel hat für uns die Registrierung für den Schluchtenweg gebucht. Herzlichen Dank dafür! Leider waren wir nur eine Nacht dort. Das Gepäck durften wir während unserer Wanderung bis am Abend im Airbnb  deponieren.

localizedReview.comments: Getting there on Serpentinenstrasse is not so difficult if you are on the road after 17:00. Because there is no more bus traffic at that time. We were in the apartment in time for sunset. A dream!  Directions and check-in with lockbox was perfect. Backpacks are ideal as luggage. Suitcases on the way with cobblestones are not recommended. Apartment is an authentic stone house in Masca, clean and wonderfully cozy. We were allowed to use the kitchen and also use pepper,salt, vinegar and oil there...Our room did not have a window, but in the  wooden entrance door you could open the upper half and thus converted into "windows" and also leave it open overnight. In the morning, José served us a fine coffee. Joel booked the registration for the Schluchtenweg for us. Many thanks for this! Unfortunately, we were only there one night. We were allowed to leave the luggage in the Airbnb until the evening during our hike.

comments: Wat een heerlijke plek, fijne ontvangst door de oom van Joel, en kat Chita. Gedeelde faciliteiten simpel, maar prima voor een nacht of twee. Prachtige bergen, een walhalla voor de wandelaar, echt de moeite waard.

localizedReview.comments: What a wonderful place, nice welcome by Joel's uncle, and cat Chita. Shared facilities simple but fine for a night or two. Beautiful mountains, a walhalla for the hiker, really worth it.

comments: Séjour très agréable chez Joël. Endroit magnifique rien à rajouter. ￼

localizedReview.comments: Very nice stay at Joël's. Beautiful place nothing to add.

comments: Vue époustouflante de la terrasse du logement, nous en avons pris plein la vue.

localizedReview.comments: A breathtaking view of the terrace of the accommodation, we took full view of it.

comments:
un endroit merveilleux, un accueil parfait .
un dépaysant total dans un lieux magique .
je le conseille à toute personne voulant profiter du couché de soleil dans un cadre idyllique.
Merci Florent et Lucie .

localizedReview.comments:
a wonderful place, a perfect welcome.
a total exotic place in a magical place.
i recommend it to anyone who wants to enjoy the sunset in an idyllic setting.
Thank you Florent and Lucie .

comments: We really enjoyed our stay at Masca. The most beautiful view you can imagine. The owner and his spouse are so nice ! Would stay there again 100%. Thank you for everything!
Indicatiile nu au fost exacte. Gazda trebuia sa imi trimimita coordonatele exacte GPS sau localizarea exacta pe harta  si gaseam repede locatia cazarii, gasit destul de greu locatia cazarii.

localizedReview.comments: The directions weren't accurate. The host had to send me the exact GPS coordinates or the exact location on the map  and I quickly found the accommodation location, found the location of the accommodation quite hard.

comments: Amazing place to stay! Joel was very friendly and helpful thanks!
Absolutely wonderful and cosy accomodation in the most magical place in Tenerife :) would definitely come again :)

Cette nuit loin de tout vaut carrément le coup !
Une vue incroyable sur la vallée de Masca dans une maison typique.
Un hôte de qualité et aux petits soins. Merci José !

localizedReview.comments:
Tonight away from everything is definitely worth it!
Amazing views of Masca Valley in a typical house.
A quality and very attentive host. Thank you José!

comments: I felt super lucky to stay here and experience the stunning views and location. The drive there isn't as bad as everyone says it is. There are 2 or 3 eateries open during the day and the one restaurant at night is both memorable and delicious, it's also possible to drive to the next village if you get bored. A special thank you to Tio Jose for his kindness and for making my birthday special :) A small tip: there is a short (and very beautiful) walk to the accommodation that is purely on cobblestones, so pack light so that you can carry your luggage as it's a bit difficult (and noisy!) to drag it all the way!

I had 3 magical days here at the end of my yoga retreat in Mandala de Masca (which I also highly recommend). I watched the beautiful sunsets each night from the terrace and read my book while sunbathing and swinging in the hammock. Jose was an incredibly kind and friendly host, and Joel conveniently provided me with a lift to the airport on my last day. Masca is a picturesque town set amongst the stunning Masca/ lava mountains. I highly recommend coming here if you want to escape from the beachfront tourist resorts and see the full beauty of Tenerife.
Joel’s place feels like home. A gem in one of the most beautiful places on earth. You’re lucky if you get to stay here!
Best location in Masca, and lovely hosts!

Es la tercera vez que me alojo en esta maravillosa casa, todo dicho. Es una experiencia única, los anfitriones son un encanto, te hacen sentir como en casa y están pendientes de cualquier detalle, además de contar algunas historias interesantísimas sobre la zona. 100% recomendado. ¡Volveré seguro!

localizedReview.comments: This is my third time staying at this wonderful house, all said. It is a unique experience, the hosts are a charm, they make you feel at home and are aware of any details, in addition to telling some very interesting stories about the area. 100% recommended. I'll be back for sure!

comments: excellent séjour cher Joël. Des hôtes accueillants, adorables, drôles et amicaux. L'environnement est EXCEPTIONNEL. Au milieu de la nature, sous les étoiles, perdus au bout du monde vous êtes au paradis de la tranquillité. Au réveil le site est enchanteur, avec une vue phénoménale. Merci pour cette expérience !

localizedReview.comments: excellent stay, dear Joël. Friendly, lovely, funny, and friendly hosts. The environment is EXCEPTIONAL. In the middle of nature, under the stars, lost at the end of the world you are in the paradise of tranquility. When you wake up, the site is enchanting, with a phenomenal view. Thank you for this experience!

comments: Increíble el alojamiento, las vistas y la familia encantadora. Totalmente recomendable.

localizedReview.comments: Amazing place, views and lovely family. Totally recommended.

comments: Me and my fiance enjoyed the stay at Joel's place very much. Joel was very nice and friendly, we arranged for an airport transfer with him, he picked us up and even stopped with us in a shop to get supplies and also to see some beautiful sunset views on the way to the house. Joel also arranged tickets for the Masca gorge trail for us which was great. The house location is amazing, great views all around and the house is lovely and traditional. Joel's uncle who stays there was also extremely friendly to us, even though he couldn't speak English. We had a great time and will definitely remember our stay!
Great stay at a secluded place with amazing view and really friendly host!

Amazing experience staying in this apartment. Thanks to Jose and his family for being so welcoming to us, despite the language barier. We enjoyed our stay and would love to return one day. Perfect place for a short stay to relax and walk in the purest nature. A few restaurants and fresh fruit stalls can be found nearby so no need to bring too much food from the supermarket. Thanks for everything ✌️

At the moment we arrived till the day we left everything was super. Host is wery kind and friendly. Place is amazing the view is amazing and is better than in pictures. Definitely going back when visiting tenerife.
Masca was such a magical place. The views from the home were amazing and our host Jose was so kind and welcoming. He was such a sweet man. We loved our stay and would highly recommend.

Ein wirklich einzigartiger Ort inmitten einer fanastischen Bergwelt, welche wir so nicht auf der Insel erwartet hätten. Die Ruhe und die Aussicht von diesem kleinen Dorf sind unbezahlbar.
Wir wurden herzlichst willkommen von Joel‘s Onkel José. Vielen Dank für den wunderbaren Aufenthalt!

localizedReview.comments:
A truly unique place in the middle of a fantastic mountain world, which we would not have expected on the island. The quietness and the view from this small village are priceless.
We were warmly welcomed by Joel's uncle José. Thanks for the wonderful stay!

comments: Es war  traumhaft schönes Ausblick.

localizedReview.comments: It was  fantastically beautiful view.

comments: We felt instantly very welcome and it was very familiar due to Elisabet and Jose (Jose is the owner & Elisabet is his girlfriend). The view to the mountains around and the sea was very peaceful and marvelous. Only if you need more privacy than just the room (kitchen and terrace was to share, and toilet was in at the terrace) you should maybe consider a different spot. But we loved it there and would definitely go there again :)
Elisabetta e il suo compagno sono stati come una famiglia per noi, la casa è in una posizione incredibile ed è bellissima! Tutte le volte che tornerò a Tenerife, prenoterò proprio qui!

localizedReview.comments: Elizabeth and her partner were like family to us, the house is in an amazing location and it's beautiful! Every time I go back to Tenerife, I'll book right here!

comments: Das Zimmer bei Joel war super, alles da, was man braucht. Aber das beste ist der Blick, die Umgebung und die große Gastfreundschaft. Ich fühlte mich sehr willkommen und hatte eine tolle Zeit, vor allem mit Joels Onkel Jose und seiner Freundin. Sie sind so herzliche und tolle Menschen, ich werde die Zeit nie vergessen! Ich komme gerne wieder :)

localizedReview.comments: The room with Joel was great, has everything you need. But the best is the view, the surroundings and the great hospitality. I felt very welcome and had a great time, especially with Joel's uncle Jose and his girlfriend. They are so warm and great people, I will never forget the time! I would love to come back :)

comments: Inolvidable y entrañable! Me sentí como en casa! Definitivamente volveré!

localizedReview.comments: Unforgettable and endearing! I felt right at home! I'll definitely be back!

comments: It was a pleasure to stay at this accommodation, very peaceful place, amazing views, it’s the perfect environment to calm your mind and relax. I appreciated the easy check in and good communication with Joel.

Hôte très accueillant, et sympathique. Le logement est située dans le cœur de Masca la vue été extraordinaire ! Logement très propre.
Attention quelques difficultés pour se garer.
belle expérience de vie !!!

localizedReview.comments:
Very welcoming and friendly host. The accommodation is located in the heart of Masca, the view was extraordinary! Very clean
accommodation. be careful some difficulties to park.
beautiful living experience!!!

comments: Joel’s place was amazing. Perfect place for your time in Masca. Stunning views! Joel was super communicative and we felt very welcome. Would highly recommend.

Es war eine wundervolle Unterkunft mit sehr herzlichem Gastgeber. Wir haben uns hier sehr wohl gefühlt. Es ist schön ruhig und direkt um die Ecke gibt es ein schönes Restaurant.
Von der Terasse hat man einen herrlichen Blick in die Masca Schlucht.
Vielen Dank!

localizedReview.comments:
It was a wonderful place with a very warm host. We felt very comfortable here. It is nice and quiet and just around the corner there is a nice restaurant.
From the terrace you have an magnificent view of the Masca Gorge.
Thank you!

comments:
The House is very traditional and simple in a remote area with the most stunning views of the ocean and the mountains. If you stay longer than one night, you should bring enough food, because the next supermarket is quite far away and there is only one restaurant that‘s open at night. But there is a kitchen where you have everything you need for a simple meal.
José lives in the house as well and he is super nice and welcoming!
The area is just beautiful and you can do a lot of nice hikes. If you want to do the hine diwn to Masca beach, you have to book tickets in advance (only week-ends) and bring good hiking equiptment.
10/10 recommend

Amazing place for a getaway, to disconnect from the city and connect with nature.
Incredible night sky full of stars. ✨✨✨
Jose was lovely and caring, spreading his positive energy and good vibe.
And Joel was very responsive and considerate.
Highly recommend this place.

Nous avons été accueillies par le merveilleux José.
La beauté de la vue est égale à la gentillesse de notre hôte.
Nous recommandons à 200% !
Un de nos meilleurs souvenirs de notre séjour à Ténérife.

localizedReview.comments:
We were greeted by the wonderful José.
The beauty of the view is equal to the kindness of our host.
We recommend 200%!
One of our best memories of our stay in Tenerife.

comments: Awesome housing at a beautiful location with awesome view, where your hosts welcome you like family. Thanks for the perfect stay!
todo bien.  gracias

localizedReview.comments: all good  thanks

comments: Très bien ! Je recommande !

localizedReview.comments: Very good! I recommend!

comments: Masca is a small calm village in the mountains and the apartment’s location is honestly to die for. I got welcomed really warmly and met lots of interesting people throughout my stay there. I can totally recommend it. I might come back next year together with friends.
Lieu paisible et hôtes très accueillant et agréable

localizedReview.comments: Peaceful place and very welcoming and pleasant hosts

comments: El alojamiento de Joel está en un lugar inigualable. En mitad del barranco de Masca y con unas vistas increíbles. Vimos un atardecer precioso desde la terraza del sitio y desde el restaurante Casa Riquelme. José nos recibió genial y nos abrió las puertas de su casa, donde dormimos en el silencio absoluto de la montaña. ¡Puro relax!

localizedReview.comments: Joel's place is in an unparalleled spot. In the middle of the Masca ravine and with an amazing view. We saw a beautiful sunset from the terrace of the site and from the Casa Riquelme restaurant. José met us great and opened the doors of his house, where we slept in the absolute silence of the mountain, opened to us. Pure relaxation!

comments:
The beauty of Masca has to be seen to be believed. Such a special experience to stay a few nights in these mountains, and witness the evening hush that descends once the tourists have left for the day. I will definitely return, next time with friends/family - I will be telling everyone about Masca.
Jose was the perfect host, offering travel tips for the area and plentiful stories. You can tell that he loves having people around - from the pride he took in making a 'cafecito' for me each morning, to the smile he would greet me with each evening upon my return from a day of hiking. Do brush up on your Spanish before you go!
I had everything I needed; I slept so peacefully each night, and always made sure to return to Masca for sunset as it's truly unlike anything I've ever seen before.
Don't be too scared of the winding road to get there - arrive early/late if you're nervous, when the road is not so busy, and I would also recommend hiring an automatic car rather than a manual.
Gorąco polecam!

localizedReview.comments: Highly recommend!

comments: Joël et son oncle José nous ont accueillies comme si nous étions de la famille. Une maison chaleureuse dans un lieu idyllique pour une expérience hors du temps. Nous avons été soufflées par la beauté du site et l'humanité de nos hôtes. José et son neveu ont le coeur sur la main, leur présence discrète et bienveillante a fait de notre passage à Masca un souvenir inoubliable. Ils ne sont pas avares de recommandations et très réactifs tout en respectant humblement l'intimité de leurs invités. Nous recommandons plus que lieu : la rencontre. Merci pour ce joli moment à tous les deux !

localizedReview.comments: Joël and his uncle José welcomed us as if we were family. A warm house in an idyllic place for a timeless experience. We have been blown away by the beauty of the site and the humanity of our hosts. José and his nephew have their hearts on their hands, their discreet and caring presence made our stay in Masca an unforgettable memory. They are not stingy with recommendations and very responsive while humbly respecting the privacy of their guests. We recommend it more than place: the meeting. Thank you for a lovely time together!

comments: Bellissimo posto! Abbastanza difficile da raggiungere ma ne vale assolutamente la pena, lo zio di Joel vi accoglierà come se foste parte della sua famiglia , pulizia top e accoglienza top

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful place! Quite difficult to reach but absolutely worth it, Joel's uncle will welcome you as if you were part of his family, top cleanliness and top hospitality

comments: Malgré un retard de vol qui a occasionné une arrivée très tardive, l'accueil fut parfait. au levée du soleil, le paysage se dévoile en un tableau superbe. Amoureux de nature et d'évasion, foncez!

localizedReview.comments: Despite a flight delay that caused a very late arrival, the welcome was perfect. At sunrise, the landscape reveals itself in a superb picture. Lovers of nature and escape, go for it!

comments: Unbelievable location in a gorgeous setting. Highly recommend
Un logement dans un village magnifique avec une vue magique.

localizedReview.comments: A home in a beautiful village with magical views.

comments: Right in the middle of Masca. Good for this money. Not really private.
Tout était super, et conforme aux descriptions! Merci encore de nous avoir reçus!

localizedReview.comments: Everything was great, and as described! Thanks again for accommodating!

comments: nous avons adoré notre nuit dans ce logement la personne qui nous a accueilli à été extrêmement agréable, et accueillante, le logement est vraiment beau et pratique , les instructions très claires même pour une arrivée tardive de nuit cela a été simple de trouver le logement . on serait bien resté plus longtemps si nous n avions pas réservé le reste de notre séjour.

localizedReview.comments: we loved our night at this accommodation. The person who welcomed us was extremely pleasant and welcoming. The accommodation is really beautiful and convenient. The instructions are very clear even for a late check-in at night. It was easy to find the accommodation . We would have stayed longer if we hadn't booked the rest of our stay.

comments: Es un lugar lleno de magia. Estuve únicamente una noche pero son de esas estancias que siempre voy a recordar. Especial mención a los dueños, muchas gracias por llenarnos con vuestra energía positiva.

localizedReview.comments: It's a place full of magic. I only stayed for one night but they are from those stays that I will always remember. Special mention to the owners, thank you so much for filling us with your positive energy.

comments: Très bon séjour dans une belle vallée

localizedReview.comments: Very good stay in a beautiful valley.

comments: Great place, if I could give it more stars, I definitely would! A little bit challenging to get to at first, but honestly, worth the hustle. Want to come back and enjoy it for a longer time. Loved our hosts, Joel and his uncle Jose are kind and welcoming people.

What can I even say first. The view was amazing, the place was so beautiful,  everything nice and clean, we could even cuddle with the cutest cat ever. The greatest part though was the hospitality and the company that Jose offered us.

Everything was just as described and shown in the pictures. The place is private, quiet and from the terrace you have an amazing view.
Joel left very clear instructions for check-in, where to park and how to get to the house. He was very helpful with any questions and always quick to respond.

WONDERFUL PLACE WITH MAGICAL VIEW
We had a very warm welcome in Joel's place by his lovely father José and his cat. Masca is beautiful!!! The view from the terrace is stunning and you will feel at home right away. We did the Masca walking trail wich was very beautiful and Joel booked our tickets. Kitchen and bathroom have everything you need. I was sad leaving this wonderful place and host!

Wow... this was truly the most incredible Airbnb I have stayed at and this experience will stay with me forever. The location is so unique and peaceful it's hard to be nothing but relaxed! The place was so comfortable and chill, Joel was a great host always responsive and very kind. His Uncle is the sweetest and very respectful!!

Excellent séjour dans le petit village de Masca !
Cette maison est un réel petit nid de bonheur.
Merci pour votre accueil chaleureux !

localizedReview.comments:
Great stay in the small village of Masca!
This house is a real little nest of happiness.
Thank you so much for your kind hospitality!

comments: This place was extremely beautiful. Nice place for stargazing, nice people in the house. We will come back.

Le lieu est magnifique, avec une vue époustouflante. José et sa compagne nous ont accueilli avec sympathie. Mais.. la famille était constamment présente, ce qui nous a donné l'impression de passer des vacances avec eux. On se sentait même parfois de trop.
La chambre n'avait pas de fenêtre et donnait directement sur le patio, lieu de passage et de vie de la famille, ce qui ne permettait aucune intimité. Nous ne pouvions pas fermer la porte la nuit, il faisait trop chaud..
La veille de notre départ, on nous a demandé de partir plus tôt, ce que nous avons accepté, mais le matin avant l'heure convenu du départ, on nous a bien notifié qu'il était temps de partir, et nous n'étions plus les bienvenus.
Par ailleurs, la salle de bain n'était pas très propre.. évier sale et cuvette du wc sale étalement.
Nous avons passé 3 nuits, mais peut-être le lieu n'est-il prévu que pour séjourner une seule nuit.

localizedReview.comments:
The place is beautiful, with breathtaking views. José and his girlfriend welcomed us with sympathy. But.. the family was always there, which made us feel like we were having a vacation with them. Sometimes it felt too much.
The bedroom had no windows and overlooked directly on the patio, a place of passage and life of the family, which did not allow any privacy. We could not close the door at night, it was too hot..
The day before we left, we were asked to leave earlier, which we accepted, but the morning before the agreed checkout time we were notified that it was time to leave, and we were no longer welcome.
In addition, the bathroom was not very clean.. dirty sink and dirty toilet bowl spread out.
We spent 3 nights, but maybe the place is only scheduled to stay only for one night.
localizedReview.response: Hi Layla, I'm really sorry that you had that impression, I understand that the place deserves more peace of mind to make it more pleasant, but you have coincided with a family celebration visit. Your sincerity is much appreciated. 🙏 And again sincere apologies.

response: Hola Layla de verdad lamento mucho que hayan tenido esa impresion, entiendo que el lugar amerita mas tranquilidad para que sea mas placentero, pero has coincidido con una visita de celebracion familiar. Agradecemos mucho tu sinceridad. 🙏 Y nuevamente sinceras disculpas.

comments: Everything was amazing, very cozy and clean, great view, friendly host.

Joel’s place is beautiful and authentic in unique and picturesque village. This is one of the most beautiful Airbnbs we’ve been to. We’ll be happy to come back for a longer period. Thank you for everything!

Endroit extraordinaire ! Bien équipé et terrasse superbe. Nous avions l' ensemble a disposition.
Le chat Yommy est adorable...
On gardera longtemps le souvenir de ce séjour !

localizedReview.comments:
Extraordinary place! Well equipped and beautiful terrace. We had everything available.
The Yommy cat is adorable...
We will keep the memory of this stay for a long time!

comments: Het ligt op een van de mooiste plekjes van het eiland. Je verblijft bij familie, dus het is niet echt privé, maar je wordt ontzettend hartelijk en vriendelijk ontvangen. Het was een speciale nacht.

localizedReview.comments: It is located in one of the island's most beautiful spots. You will be staying with family, so it is not really private, but you will be received very warmly and kindly. It was a special night.

comments: Joel è stato molto disponibile e gentile nel momento in cui ho effettuato la prenotazione. Mi ha fornito tutte le informazioni per accedere all'alloggio e per godermi Masca (orari ristoranti, prenotazione del Barranco). Il posto è meraviglioso, con una vista bellissima e un patio rilassante. Joel non era presente e ha gestito il nostro soggiorno suo zio. Il check-in è andato liscio, la camera era pulita e ordinata, ma non c'erano finestre, quindi faceva molto caldo. Una volta rientrate dalla cena siamo state invitate a una piccola festa familiare che si stava svolgendo nel patio in cui ci hanno offerto da bere e da mangiare. Tuttavia, gli ospiti si sono trattenuti fino a tardissimo bevendo e facendo molto rumore fino alla mattina. Inoltre, la mattina successiva siamo state costrette a scavalcare e a svegliare il padrone (ancora ubriachissimo) perchè non ci aveva fornito nè la chiave del cancello di ingresso nè il suo numero e non potevamo nè uscire nè rientrare.

localizedReview.comments: Joel was very helpful and kind at the time I made the booking. She gave me all the information to access the accommodation and to enjoy Masca (restaurant hours, Barranco reservation). The place is wonderful, with a beautiful view and a relaxing patio. Joel was not present and managed our stay with his uncle. Check-in went smoothly, the room was clean and tidy, but there were no windows, so it was very hot. Once we came back from dinner, we were invited to a small family party that was taking place on the patio where they offered us drinks and food. However, guests stayed until very late drinking and making a lot of noise until the morning. Also, the next morning we were forced to climb over and wake up the owner (still very drunk) because he had not provided us with the key to the entrance gate or his number and we could not leave or return.

comments: Joël a été très disponible et facile à contacter. Bon petit séjour à Masca

localizedReview.comments: Joël was very available and easy to contact. Have a nice stay in Masca

comments:
Logement très agréable et charmant avec une vue magnifique.
Instructions pour accéder à la maison très claires.
José est très accueillant.
Séjour parfait, nous recommandons.

localizedReview.comments:
Very nice and charming accommodation with a great view.
Very clear instructions for accessing the house.
José is very welcoming.
Perfect stay, we recommend it.

comments:
Joel’ s place is just amasing!:)
We were so welcomed by his family.
I recommand this marvelous airbnb! :)
The vue and landscapes are marvelous.

This was the best Airbnb I have stayed at in my life. Truly beautiful house in a unique location, as well as staying with Elizabeth and Joao was a pleasure. They were both welcoming and lots of fun to spend time around. I cannot recommend this place enough.
Lieu magique, parfait pour un couple !

localizedReview.comments: Magical place, perfect for a couple!

comments: Our stay was wonderful and one of the more unique experiences we've had. The location is simply remarkable. Joel was incredibly helpful and one of the best hosts I've ever communicated with. The place is exactly as described. Nothing fancy, but a beautiful place to relax. Due note that Masca is fairly remote and the walk to the place involves elevation.
This is the place to be

Nous avons adoré l’hébergement de Joel. Il s’agit d’une si belle maison avec une vue incroyable. C’est parfait pour les amoureux de la nature et pour les randonnées. Plusieurs à proximité. De plus, cet endroit est magnifique, mais il faut travailler pour y aller! La route est sinueuse mais totalement faisable. Si vous préférez la plage, ce n’est peut-être pas le bon endroit pour vous!
Joel est un hôte attentif et respectueux. Cette place s’agit d’un coup de coeur pour nous !

localizedReview.comments:
We loved Joel's place to stay. This is such a beautiful house with an amazing view. It's perfect for nature lover and hiking. Many nearby. Also, this place is beautiful, but you have to work to get there! The road is winding but totally doable. If you prefer the beach, this may not be the right place for you!
Joel is an attentive and respectful host. This spot is a favorite for us!

comments: Joel was really friendly and the location is breathtaking, really quiet and super cosy!
La casa de Joel, al igual que él, es una maravilla. Hermosas vistas desde allá y muy buena vibra la que transmite. Para repetir.

localizedReview.comments: Joel's place, like him, is wonderful. Beautiful views from there and very good vibes. To go to repeat.

comments: Joel is the best host you could ask for. He is as kind and helpful as they come, and we felt totally at home and comfortable in his place. We got a personal tour of the home and learned about the family history there and how they came to renovate the property. We also spent time talking to his cousin next door and bought some delicious cactus fruit from him.  This unit is one of the coolest places I've ever stayed, and an incredible place to relax and unwind. Unfortunately, the hike thru the canyon to the ocean is still only open on weekends, so we were unable to go, but Joel offered to arrange tickets for us even when we were not staying at his place. I highly recommend this unit to others.

Logement au top : agréable et reposant !
Accessible à pied uniquement.
Seul inconvénient : salle de bain partagée.
Un unique restaurant dans le village mais cuisine très bonne.

localizedReview.comments:
Excellent accommodation: pleasant and relaxing!
Walking distance only
Only downside: shared bathroom.
A unique restaurant in the village but very good cuisine.

comments: Joel was very friendly and responsive. He recommended us a local restaurant with good food. The view from the apartment was amazing. We felt at home and would definitely recommend Joel’s apartment.

The accommodation is wonderful, the place is easy to find. Although the road to Masca is narrow, the roads are in excellent condition and the drivers drive slowly and considerately.
Check in was easy, I was given a code and instructions on where to find the room keys.
The accommodation is much more beautiful than in the photos and I definitely recommend the place.
I was originally supposed to spend two nights here, but unfortunately I experienced a somewhat unpleasant situation when one of my neighbors came to me at about 10 in the evening and told me that someone was with me in the accommodation and that I should be careful. It was my first solo trip, so I preferred to leave the accommodation one day earlier.
If you are already more experienced in solo travel or are not traveling alone, then you will certainly enjoy your stay here and nothing will make you end it prematurely.
Thank you very much for the opportunity to spend time here.🩷
Wer die Ruhe liebt und abseits vom Trubel die Aussicht genießen möchte ist hier an der richtigen Adresse.

localizedReview.comments: If you love peace and quiet and want to enjoy the view away from the hustle and bustle, this is the place.

comments: Joel was very nice and friendly:) Welcomed us with a cold homemade lemonade and had a friendly chat  😉 I loved the casa and it was just for us for a night. It’s old and traditional so don’t expect “luxury “ but that was exactly what I was looking for 🥰 and enjoyed the night and beautiful morning there 120%! Muchísimas gracias por todo! ☀️ We come back again! 😊 K&A

C’est le meilleure airbnb que j’ai fais ici. Une vue incroyable dans un endroit incroyable avec pas mal de spot de randonnées à proximité. Le logement est pas très facile d’accès mais les instructions clair de Joel et le paysage incroyable permettent de passer outre sans problème. L’hôte est très sympathique et à le sens de l’hospitalité. Une expérience incroyable et encore merci à Joel.

localizedReview.comments: This is the best airbnb I've done here. Amazing views in an amazing location with quite a few hiking spots nearby. The accommodation is not very easy to access but Joel's clear instructions and the incredible landscape make it easy to override. The host is very friendly and has a sense of hospitality. An amazing experience and thanks again to Joel.

comments:
notre arrivée a été compliquée car c'était difficile pour nous de nous repérer et Joël malheureusement ne captait pas.
les instructions nous indiquaient de nous installer dans une chambre différente que celle présentée, meilleure sûrement mais le lit n'était pas prêt. il y avait tout pour le faire cela dit.
nous n'avons pas rencontré nos hôtes mais Joël a été présent la veille dans la journée sauf au moment de notre arrivée tumultueuse et le matin aussi.
la vue est sublime et le logement que nous avons eu rien que pour nous était très agréable.

localizedReview.comments:
our arrival was complicated because it was difficult for us to find our way around and Joël unfortunately was not capturing.
the instructions told us to settle in a different room than the one presented, probably better but the bed was not ready. there was everything to do that said.
we did not meet our hosts but Joël was there the day before in the day except at the time of our tumultuous arrival and in the morning too.
the view is sublime and the place we had just for us was very nice to us.

comments:
Muy amable, nos hizo sentir como en casa desde el primer momento. Tanto el trato como el sitio son inmejorables. La casa tiene todo lo que puedas necesitar y Joel lo puso todo a nuestro servicio. Una de las mejores experiencias que hemos tenido usando el servicio de Airbnb.
En resumen es una parada necesaria del viaje por Tenerife, el lugar donde se encuentra y la hospitalidad del anfitrión hace que tenga que recomendar el sitio a cualquier persona que quiera una experiencia única.

localizedReview.comments:
Very kind, it made us feel at home from the moment we arrived. Both the service and the site are unbeatable. The house has all that you can need and Joel put it all at our service. One of the best experiences we had using Airbnb.
In short, it is a necessary stop of the trip through Tenerife, the place where it is located and the host's hospitality makes it necessary to recommend the site to anyone who wants a unique experience.

comments: Beautiful stay, better than the pictures. Private and comfortable. Will definitely come back.
Amazing stay in Masca, really worth staying the night. The place is very clean, authentic and the view incredible!

Joël made us feel at home. The village is special with stunning views all around.
Thank you Joël!
I wish I could stay in this amazing place for more than one night! one of the most magical places I ever visited in my life! Thank you for everything! hope to visit again sometime.. lots of love ❤️
Everything perfect

Joel's house is a wonderful oasis in the mountains of Masca. A stunning location and equipped with everything you meed for a comfortable stay. We were only there for one night but could have easily stayed for more, without hesitation. The views are incredible and lazing in the hammock on the terrace taking it all in are memories that will last forever. Once parked the house is about a 10 minute walk through the valley, app part of the adventure. Stock up en route to Masca so you have all your supplies to hand. The kitchen is well equipped for preparing your own food. There are places to eat in Masca or places just for a drink, you will pass these en route to the house. We stopped in the one by the church.
Joel's house is what Airbnb is about, living like a local and experiencing all the wonderful things that the culture and country provudes outside of the main tourist areas. Thank you!

It’s good to know that there are still these kind of Airbnb’s where the host welcomes you with a freshly brewed cup of coffee. Joel made us feel like home from the minute we entered. The room and the terrace was super clean, the kitchen as well, but we didn’t use it as we only stayed one night. Joel was also very helpful with advising us where to eat (Casa Riquelme, very nice local food) as only one restaurant was open in the evening. But for sure the best thing about Joel‘s place is the view. It is worth the walk from the Main Street for sure!
Loved this place! Views are immaculate, Joel’s hospitality is unbeatable and the description is spot on - it’s a must stay in the Masca area.

excellente increible, las palabras me faltan el lugar y la persona fueron muy especial
muy amical y muchos gatossss
hasta la proxima vez
porque vamos a volver por seguro!!!

localizedReview.comments:
excellent incredible, the words are missing the place and the person was very special
very friendly and a lot of cats
to the next time
because we will be back for sure!!!

comments: Cet endroit est magique et la maison de Joel permet d’en profiter pleinement. Une vue incroyable depuis la terrasse, une chambre très propre et confortable et surtout un hôte au top. Joel est très réactif, attentionné et prend soin des gens qu’il accueille, il est en plus très agréable, un verre offert à notre arrivée et un beau petit moment partagé avec lui. Cette nuit à Masca a été la meilleure partie de notre séjour à Tenerife, je le recommande mille fois !! Merci pour tout Joel, on espère y retourner bientôt !

localizedReview.comments: This place is magical and Joel's house allows you to fully enjoy it. An incredible view from the terrace, a very clean and comfortable room and above all a top host. Joel is very responsive, attentive and takes care of the people he welcomes, he is also very pleasant, a drink offered on arrival and a beautiful little moment shared with him. Tonight in Masca was the best part of our stay in Tenerife, I recommend it a thousand times!! Thanks for everything Joel, we hope to come back again soon!
localizedReview.response: Oh thank you, what beautiful words, you also have a good heart when you see the beauty of the place. You will always be welcome

comments:
I really enjoyed my stay at Joel’s place. He was really responsive and helpful.
We have arrived to Masca earlier, before official check-in time. As our room was still busy, Joel gave us another, bigger room free of cost so we could occupy it before lunch.
The place is even better than in the photos. The view from there was breathtaking. I really liked the style of the place. As it was written in the description, it is old but in a really good shape and really clean. The terrace was my favourite. I already miss this place!
Recommend 100%.

La casa de Joel está ubicada en el lugar más espectacular de lo que vimos en teneriffe. Todo es auténtico y encantador.

We recommend 100% !

comments: wunderschöne Aussicht, tolle und ruhige Lage, superfreundlicher und sympatischer Gastgeber, gemütliches zuhause

comments:

comments:

localizedReview.comments:

comments: This place is really something special and Joel takes great care of the house and its surroundings.

Unvergleichliches Panorama wie auf den Fotos, etwas abseits vom touristischeren Teil Mascas. Mit bezaubender Umgebung, mitten in der Masca-Schlucht.

Unterkunft ist nicht direkt mit dem Auto erreichbar, aber der Gehweg vom Parkplatz beträgt nur 5-10 Minuten.

localizedReview.comments:

Accommodation is not directly accessible by car, but the walk from the parking is only 5-10 minutes.

localizedReview.comments: The room is in a wonderful location overlooking the Barranco. The patio is very cozy and the room clean. the car can be parked within 10 minutes walk. I would definitely go back!

comments: When you arrive at Joel’s place you feel like you stepped in a piece of heaven. Probably the best view you will find out there. The rooms is very cozy and has a beautiful appeal. Joel is super helpful and friendly and he makes all his guests feel like they are visiting a friend. We highly recommend this place!
response: Thanks so much Corina, Actually my guests are my friends 😁

comments: Super logement, une vue à couper le souffle sur le village de Masca en compagnie d’un gentil petit chat. Jose est vraiment très sympa et très arrangeant. Merci encore à lui. Il nous as donner des conseils et instruction utiles. Et sont également très discret. Je recommande ++

comments: Nous n'avions pas été très attentifs à l'annonce quand nous avons réservé, charmés par la photo de la terrasse et par le fait que le logement se trouve à Masca, petit village que ma file avait adoré lors d'un précédent séjour. Nous n'avions pas fait attention qu'il s'agissait d'une chambre avec salle de bain et terrasse communes. Sur le coup nous nous sommes un peu demandé comment nous allions faire d'autant que sur Masca les restaurants ne servent pas le soir et que la route qui y descend limite un peu l'envie de ressortir le soir. C'était sans compter la gentillesse de nos hôtes, José l'oncle de Joel et son amie qui ont été adorables et nous ont laissé libre accès à leur cuisine.  Le logement de Joël est très pittoresque avec une décoration typique dans un lieu super. Ceux qui cherchent un logement moderne fuyaient. Ceux qui privilégient l'authenticité et les rapports humains fonçaient! Attention cependant, le logement n'est pas facile d'accès.

localizedReview.comments: We hadn't been very attentive to the listing when we booked, charmed by the photo of the terrace and the fact that the accommodation is in Masca, a small village that my line loved during a previous stay. We hadn't paid attention that it was a room with a shared bathroom and terrace. At the time, we wondered a bit about how we were going to do it, especially since on Masca the restaurants do not serve in the evening and that the road that goes down there limits the desire to come out in the evening. Not to mention the kindness of our hosts, Joel's uncle and his friend who were lovely and gave us free access to their kitchen.  Joël's place is very picturesque with a typical decor in a great location. Those looking for modern space were leaking. Those who prioritize authenticity and human relationships were roaming! Please note, however, that the property is not easy to access.

comments:
Un de nos meilleurs hébergements lors de notre séjour à Tenerife ! Nous avons eu la chance de rencontrer son propriétaire. Joël est également très aimable et nous a permis d'obtenir le permis pour randonner dans les gorges de masca (permis obligatoire et randonnée possible uniquement le week end). Nous avons passés toute la soirée sur les hamacs se trouvant sur la magnifique terrasse de notre hébergement. Notre plus beau coucher de soleil ! Le propriétaire et sa compagne sont très amicaux :)
Bon restaurant Casa Riquelme juste à côté de l'hebergement pour y manger le soir... toujours avec une vue superbe
Une parenthese de serenité, de calme... bref se bonheur
Aliénor & Emmanuel

localizedReview.comments:
One of our best places to stay in Tenerife! We had the chance to meet its owner. Joël is also very kind and allowed us to get the permit to hike in the Masca gorges (mandatory permit and hike possible only on weekends). We spent the whole evening on the hammocks on the beautiful terrace of our accommodation. Our best sunset! The owner and his partner are very friendly:)
Good restaurant Casa Riquelme right next to the accommodation to eat in the evening... always with a great view
A parenthese of serenity, quiet... in short,
Aliénor & Emmanuel
localizedReview.response: How beautiful people are grateful, you deserve the best. With our best regards

comments: Joel’s uncle and his wife were so sweet and they hosted us in such beautiful way! We loved to stay there and we felt home. The house is stunning, with beautiful surroundings and the nightsky is so clear at night!

Amazing town with an awesome view of the valley. Joel is very responsive, kind and friendly. if you want to visit Masca for hike or to stay, this place is great. Nice view of the valley. Thanks again Joel.

Nous avons été très bien guidés pour accéder et trouver le logement, le parking dispose d’assez de place pour se garer. Le cadre est incroyable et paisible, cela sort de l’ordinaire il faut le reconnaître. Nous avons pu nous faire un petit repas à la propriété le soir et trouver un restaurant typique dans les environs à la marche. La chambre est charmante mais la le matelas était un petit peu dur à mon goût. Sinon tout était parfait, nous avons passé un super moment, les hôtes étaient particulièrement attentionnés et agréables.

localizedReview.comments: We were very well guided to access and find the accommodation, the parking has enough space to park.
