Otherwise everything was perfect, we had a great time, the hosts were particularly thoughtful and pleasant.

comments: The view was insane! A must do for nature lover
Grandios, würde auf jeden Fall wieder kommen!!!

localizedReview.comments: Great, would definitely come back!!!

comments: En todo momento hubo comunicación, un lugar para repetir sin duda!!

localizedReview.comments: At all times there was communication, a place to repeat without a doubt!!

comments: This place was amazing! The surrounding is breathtaking, all I can say now is WOW and thank you!

Super cozy and spectacular location for a romantic getaway in Tenerife. The house is beautiful, it has a breath-taking view of green desertic mountains and the Atlantic ocean (exactly like the pictures). It's located in a very small town on the top of the western mountains of the island. A couple of hints: you should have a car to access it, as public transport is fairly limited in the island. You can drive with your car on a very tiny road to offload and load your luggage and supplies next to the place, otherwise you should expect a good workout if you carry everything by foot from the parking lot ;-). There aren't any supermarkets within a walkable distance, so make sure to take everything you need in terms of food and drinks (there are local fruit handlers, bars, cafés and restaurants near by). Joel and his uncle José were super friendly and helpful, I recommend 100% and will visit again!
un emplacement incroyable pour profiter du paysage !

localizedReview.comments: amazing location to enjoy the scenery!

comments: The most beautiful place we ever visited. Beautiful house with stunning views. His uncle José is a great host and wonderful person. 10/10

Unfortunately we were in Masca only for one night. But if we knew how beautiful this place is and how nice Joel, his uncle and their cats are, we would definitely stay longer:) Everything was just perfect.
Thank you!

Splendida posizione, un piccolo paradiso, molto suggestivo in questa stagione di piena fioritura.
Joel non l’abbiamo incontrato ma ci ha accolti José signore molto attento e cordiale.
La strada per Masca è una strada stretta e tortuosa. Consiglio di restare lì e godersi le passeggiate. Per fare il percorso più noto occorre prenotare, cosa che noi non siamo abituati a fare, ma è l’unico modo per poter passeggiare. Senza costi. Sono molto attenti all’impatto ambientale e i parchi sono tenuti benissimo. Consiglio di prenotare, noi abbiamo fatto altri percorsi, ci sono bellissime passaggiate ma resta il rammarico per quella mancata!
Bello. Non per turismo di massa ma di scoperta della natura.

localizedReview.comments:
Beautiful location, a small paradise, very suggestive in this season of full bloom.
Joel, we didn't meet him, but José was very attentive and friendly.
The road to Masca is a narrow, winding road. I recommend staying there and enjoying the walks. To make the most famous route you need to book, which we are not used to doing, but is the only way to walk. No cost. They are very attentive to the environmental impact and the parks are very well kept. I recommend booking, we have done other routes, there are beautiful steps but we are still sorry for the lack!
Beautiful. Not for mass tourism but discovering nature.

comments:
Un peu difficile d'accès mais bien détaillé par Joël avant notre arrivée dans les lieux. La vue est juste dingue (et le mot est faible...)
La vie chez Joël est très sympathique, il faut aimer discuter avec les autres locataires et faire des câlins au chat 😊
Je recommande à 100%

localizedReview.comments:
A little difficult to access but well detailed by Joël before we arrived at the premises. The view is just crazy (and the word is weak...)
Life at Joël's is very friendly, you have to love chatting with the other tenants and hugging the cat 😊
I would recommend it 100%

comments: We hebben een geweldig verblijf gehad! We werden hartelijk ontvangen door de oom van de hoost, Jose. Een vriendelijke en vrolijke man die ons meteen thuis liet voelen. Hij gaf ons vers fruit direct uit de tuin en reserveerde voor ons een plekje bij het naastgelegen restaurant. Het huis heeft een prachtige ligging met een geweldig uitzicht op de vallei van Masca en we hebben hier een van onze allermooiste zonsondergangen ooit gezien! De kamer was verder mooi en netjes en we hebben heerlijk geslapen in het bed. Ook het restaurant waar we hebben gegeten (Casa Requelme) was geweldig! Het is het enige restaurant dat hier 's avonds open is en ze hebben geen kaart, je eet wat je krijgt. Het hoofdgerecht was heerlijk en ook hier was het uitzicht prachtig. 'S nachts hebben we op het terras van ons huis nog mogen genieten van een prachtige sterrenhemel. Al met al is het een onvergetelijke ervaring geweest en echt een aanrader om een nacht in Masca door te brengen!

localizedReview.comments: We had a great stay! We were warmly welcomed by the uncle of the hoost, Jose. A friendly and cheerful man who made us feel right at home. He gave us fresh fruit straight from the garden and booked a spot for us at the adjacent restaurant. The house has a beautiful location with an great view of the valley of Masca and we have seen one of our most beautiful sunsets ever here! The room was otherwise nice and tidy and we slept wonderfully in the bed. Also the restaurant where we ate (Casa Requelme) was great! It's the one restaurant that's open here at night and they don't have a card, you eat what you get. The main course was lovely and also here the view was beautiful. At night we were still able to enjoy a beautiful starry sky in the terrace of our house. All in all, it has been an unforgettable experience and highly recommended to spend a night in Masca!

comments: One of the best place to stay. I hope to come back again one day. Thank you 🙏
Wonderful stay, top notch location, comfort and experience. Will be back!

Alles super!
Ein Traum!
Kommen gerne wieder

localizedReview.comments:
Everything great!
A dream!
We will be happy to come back

comments: This hidden gem was the perfect get-a-way spot in the tranquil mountains of Tenerife. We had such a good time staying with our friendly host and his cute cat. Hands down our favourite accommodation experience on the island. Thank you abuelito and hasta luego

Nous avons adoré le séjour.
Sur place, le calme absolu.

We loved the stay.
On site, absolute calm.

We recommend eyes a second thought!

comments: This is kinda unique. We stayed one night in Masca - it was a great experience. The accommodation is shared with Joels family, meaning you share bath and kitchen and terrace. It is perfect for a short stay. We liked it.

Such an amazing stay here! Friendly,made us feel right at home greeted us with a cold beer and Elizabeth such a sweet heart had great stories& made coffee for us in the morning. Couldn’t recommend this place more, it’s paradise! So peaceful&beautiful. We got up at 3 am to see the stars and it made the whole experience even more magical! Thank you for having us 🤍
The best view an Airbnb can get. The place was amazing.

We had an amazing time at Joel’s place. He is such a lovely host. We were welcomed with a warm smile even though we arrived later than we communicated. The place was perfect for a nice getaway from the city life and just be in the nature with a spectacular view. Words can’t describe how beautiful Masca is and we will definitely recommend Joel’s place for stay.
This was definitely the highlight of our short but beautiful trip to Tenerife.
Joel was a very responsive and welcoming host, we definitely recommend for anyone wishing to spend some time in Masca Valley.
Increíble lugar y Joel un encanto. Nos encantó alojarnos allí. Recomendadisimo si lo que quieren es tranquilidad, unas vistas de ensueño y sentirse como en casa.

localizedReview.comments: Fantastic place and Joel is a friend. We loved staying there Highly recommended if you want is tranquility, a dreamy view and feeling at home.

comments: Nous n’avons pas rencontré Joël en physique, mais José, son oncle nous a accueilli très amicalement. Joël a toujours su être réactif par message avec des recommandations. Notre séjour ne pouvait pas mieux se passer. Le logement est dans un environnement juste dépaysant… la chambre, la cuisine et la salle d’eau sont très propres et fonctionnelles! Nous sommes restés sans voix au début! Nous aurions voulu discuter plus longuement avec José mais notre séjour était programmé ainsi… ne passez surtout pas à côté de ce magnifique voyage à Masca, jamais vous ne le regretterez !!!

localizedReview.comments: We didn't meet Joël in physical, but José, his uncle welcomed us very friendly. Joël has always been responsive by message with recommendations. Our stay couldn't have gone better. The accommodation is in a just exotic environment… the bedroom, the kitchen and the bathroom are very clean and functional! We have been speechless in the beginning! We would have liked to chat longer with José but our stay was scheduled as well… do not miss this magnificent trip to Masca, you will never regret it!!!

comments: Bezauberndes Haus mit atemberaubendem Blick über die Schlucht! Joel und sein Onkel José waren sehr zuvorkommende und charmante Gastgeber. Bequemes Bett, auch bei kühlem Wetter gut isoliertes Schlafzimmer. Wärmstens zu empfehlen!

localizedReview.comments: Adorable house with breathtaking view over the canyon! Joel and his uncle José were very accommodating and charming hosts. Comfy bed, well insulated bedroom even in cool weather. Highly recommended!

comments: We really enjoyed our stay in this beautiful area and we recommend it to everyone that would like to experience something special! :)

We had a wonderful stay at Joel's uncle Jose's home.  The location is perfect and the whole house is lovely. Joel was very helpful with the direction + providing all the information we needed. Thank you for such a memorable experience!
La tranquilidad del lugar

localizedReview.comments: The tranquility of the place

comments: Environnement merveilleux. Parfait pour les amoureux de la nature et du calme (surtout le soir apres le départ des visiteurs. On se sent chanceux) Il ne faut pas etre trop chargés car impossible d y acceder en voiture. Petite marche à pied dans des ruelles escarpées. Prévoir votre repas car rien sur place le soir (nous y etions en fevrier) et habits chauds car nuits fraiches. José, notre hôte, est rayonnant et prévenant. Communication facile bien que notre espagnol soit très limité. Merci à lui et à "tchicha" (le chat)!

localizedReview.comments: Wonderful environment. Perfect for lovers of nature and calm (especially in the evening after visitors leave. We feel lucky) You should not be too busy because it is impossible to access it by car. Small walking in steep alleyways. Plan your meal because nothing on site in the evening (we were there in February) and warm clothes because cool nights. José, our host, is radiant and considerate. Easy communication although our Spanish is very limited. Thanks to him and "chicha" (the cat)!

comments: He was wonderful with service, he always responds to messages and offered help if needed! Thank you Joel!

The room wasn't very well cleaned and we didn't feel fully comfortable in the bed with the 5 different sheets... Jose (the uncle of joel who lives in the room next door) was very sweet and welcoming! A secret type if you like a real insight into original life.

comments:
Masca is a unique place in Teneriffe. Prepare for some driving in narrow roads and high mountains. The beautiful scenery and peace at the end is totally worth it!
Joel's family warm-heartedly welcomed us and we had a unique experience in this tiny mountain village. The sky full of stars at night here is probably the most impressive I have ever experienced in my life! 5/5
Joel's uncle Jose was a wonderful host. His house offers unforgettable views from Masca to the ocean. If one wants to experience authentic canary culture, one should stay at Joe's.

Wat een heerlijke plek om een  paar dagen tot rust te komen. Warme ontvangst en zorg door Jose, die met z’n 70+ nog steeds de energie van een jong veulen in zich draagt. Het prachtige zicht op de kloof en de bergen, Jose’s verhalen over de geschiedenis van het dorp, de ontmoetingen, de prachtige wandelingen in de omgeving… Allemaal dingen die m’n verblijf in Masca tot een onvergetelijke 3-daagse maakten..

localizedReview.comments: What a wonderful place to come to peace for a  couple of days. Warm welcome and care by Jose, who still carries the energy of a young foal with his 70+. comments: Polecamy ten nocleg z całego serca! Po przeczytaniu komentarzy zdecydowaliśmy się na pozostanie w Masca aż na 4 noce i to była bardzo dobra decyzja. Miejsce to ma niesamowitą energię również za sprawą przesympatycznego gospodarza Jose! Cisza, spokój i otoczenie naturą dają możliwość zrelaksowania się, zawłaszcza po długim trekkingu. Śpi się tutaj doskonale. Współdzielenie łazienki i kuchni z gospodarzem nie było żadnym problemem. Dojazd do samej miejscowości wypożyczonym autem faktycznie jest dla bardziej doświadczonych kierowców, ale zawsze można dojechać tu autobusem.

localizedReview.comments: We recommend this place with all our heart! After reading the comments, we decided to stay in Masca for 4 nights and it was a very good decision. They sleep well here. Sharing the bathroom and kitchen with the host was no problem. Getting to the village rented by a car is actually for more experienced drivers, but you can always take a bus.

comments: El entorno es una maravilla y el inquilino muy amable y simpático. Nos recomendaron que cenáramos en Casa Riquelme, imprescindible y recomendado. Gracias por una noche inolvidable en Masca.

comments: Magical place, I felt like at home. Joel and his uncle Joseito are very kind and helpful. Uncle Jose tells very interesting stories about the area or his life. Masca ist ein wunderschöner Ort, wo man definitiv eine Nacht verbringen sollte. Nirgendwo anders haben wir solch einen Sternenhimmel bestaunt! Ausserdem ist es perfekt, um Wanderungen zu machen in der Gegend.
Das Zimmer von Joel und seinem Onkel ist klein, kühl und ordentlich. Es bietet alles, was man braucht. Auch das Badezimmer ist sauber und die Dusche mit heissem Wasser perfekt nach einer Wanderung. Die Küche bietet alles, was man braucht- man darf sich auch ein Plätzchen im Kühlschrank reservieren. Das Panorama, das sich von dieser Wohnung und diesem Balkon aus bietet ist einfach unglaublich! Wir würden jederzeit wiederkommen. Die Kommunikation mit Joel lief reibungslos ab und Joels Onkel hat uns herzlich empfangen. Wir wünschen beiden von Herzen alles Gute!

localizedReview.comments:
Masca is a beautiful place where you should definitely spend a night. Nowhere else have we marveled at such a starry sky! In addition, it is perfect for hiking in the area
Joel and his uncle's room is small, cool and tidy. It offers everything you'll need. The bathroom is also clean and the hot water shower perfect for a hike. The kitchen offers everything you need - you can also reserve a seat in the fridge. The panorama that offers itself from this apartment and this balcony is just amazing! We would come back out. The communication with Joel was easy and Joel's uncle welcomed us warmly. We wish you all the best!

Masca war der schönste Ort, den ich auf Teneriffa besucht habe. Es gibt wirklich eine überwältigende Aussicht ins Tal. Vom Ort, aber auch von der Terrasse selbst. Das Zimmer ist bei Joels Onkel José.
Es gibt ein gemeinsames Bad und eine gemeinsame Küche. Die Küche ist etwas chaotisch, dafür darf man alles mit benutzen und ich wurde mehrfach zum Essen eingeladen.
Anreise: man kommt mit dem Bus gut in den Ort.
Einkaufen muss man im Nachbarort. Cafés und Restaurants gibt es hingegen ein paar, allerdings ist abends fast alles geschlossen und der Ort ist wunderbar still. Nur VogelGezwitscher und Salamander, die durchs Gebüsch rascheln.
Die Kommunikation lief sehr gut, gute Wegbeschreibung, extrem flexibler check in und check out, bei der Abreise wurde ich kostenfrei ins nächste Dorf gefahren, um meinen Bus zu erreichen.
Ich würde auf jeden Fall wieder hin fahren!

localizedReview.comments:
Masca was the most beautiful place I visited in Tenerife. There really has an overwhelming view of the valley. From the place, but also from the terrace itself. The room is with Joel's uncle José.
There is a shared bathroom and a shared kitchen. The kitchen is a bit messy, but you can use everything and I have been invited to eat several times.
Arrival: you can easily get to the place by bus.
You have to shop in the neighboring town. On the other hand, there are a few cafes and restaurants, but almost everything is closed in the evening and the place is wonderfully quiet. Only birds chirping and salamanders rustling through the bushes.
The communication went very well, good directions, extremely flexible check-in and check-out, on departure I was driven to the next village for free to reach my bus.
I would definitely stay here again.

comments:
An incredibly beautiful spot in dramatic scenery – amenities are simple but totally adequate and Joseito was a very friendly and welcoming host - and communication with Joel was excellent.
The restaurant up the path - Casa Riquelme- is also superb though be aware that the food is solely what the chef is cooking and will contain meat - a truly memorable experience. (and best to reserve before going)
Highly recommended

Wir hatten einen super Aufenthalt. Die Lage in den Bergen ist wunderschön und der Ausblick einfach nur Atemberaubend. Als Begrüßung haben wir gleich ein Bier angeboten bekommen und zum Frühstück hat Joels Onkel uns gefüllte Maisbrötchen gemacht.
Die Unterkunft ist zum Empfehlen!

localizedReview.comments:
We had a great stay. The location in the mountains is beautiful and the view just breathtaking. As a welcome, we were offered a beer and for breakfast Joel's uncle made us stuffed corn buns.
The place is recommended!

comments: It was a very nice stay. A little difficult to get there by bus, especially if you're aming for the last one;) But we made it with very accommodating help from Joel. His uncle welcomed us warmly and we had a very pleasant time. We we're able to prepare our food in the kitchen and eat on the lovely terrace. Masca is really beautiful. Muchas gracias
Fantástico lugar como base para descender el barranco de Masca y muy buena atención de Joel y de su tío

localizedReview.comments: Fantastic place as a base to descend the ravine of Masca and very good service from Joel and his uncle

comments:
This place is lovelywith a stunning view. Uncle José is a very kind guy who likes to chat (if your spanish is better than ours :))
We definitely recommend this authentic place.
Une véritable expérience de dormir à Masca et de partager un moment avec José. Il faut le vivre comme un instant de partage chez l’habitant et non comme un simple airbnb.

localizedReview.comments: A real experience of sleeping in Masca and sharing a moment with José. You have to live it like a moment of sharing in the home and not like a simple Airbnb.

comments: Joel and Jose were excellent hosts! So kind, fun, and warm-hearted! I will definitely be back to visit again, and my experience in Masca wouldn't have been the same without these amazing hosts!

Le paradis sur terre !!! La chambre n'a pas de fenêtre, mais pour une nuit ce n'est pas derangeant. La cuisine commune etait bien équipée. La salle d'eau/wc etait propre. Le calme absolu dans un cadre fantastique. Joseito était très accueillant et nous le remercions.

localizedReview.comments: Heaven on earth!!! The bedroom has no windows, but for one night it is not disturbing. Kitchen was well equipped. The bathroom/toilet was clean. Absolute quiet in a fantastic setting. Joseito was very welcoming and we thank him.

comments: un séjour inoubliable ! José et Lenin sont sympathique accueillant et adorent partager. la vue de la maison est magnifique . un de mes meilleurs souvenirs sur l'île

localizedReview.comments: an unforgettable stay! José and Lenin are friendly welcoming and love to share. the view from the house is magnificent. one of my best memories on the island

comments: Cadre sublime, acceuil chaleur, et de très bon conseil pour le séjour, encore merci beaucoup à Joël et José

localizedReview.comments: Sublime setting, warm welcome, and very good advice for the stay, thank you again very much to Joël and José

comments: The place has a stunning view and vibe, it was very well kept and we felt very welcome by Joel and his uncle. It was also valuable to receive local tips from them.

Hôte adorable, endroit magique !!!
Un vrai petit paradis

localizedReview.comments:
Lovely host, magical place!!!
A real little paradise

comments: Magical place, amazing host, perfectly cleaned room. Would certainly come back.

Très bonne adresse avec un accueil au top de Joël et de son oncle aux sourires permanents et poussant la chansonnette du matin au soir. Vue fantastique depuis une maison typique canarienne. On se sent ici comme à la maison. Joël et son oncle vous apporteront par ailleurs tous les conseils utiles pour bonifier votre séjour et ils vous raconteront aussi la vie d'autrefois à Masca si vous le souhaitiez. Sans hésitation, Masca restera le meilleur souvenir de notre séjour à Tenerife. Pour information, la randonnée dans la gorge de Masca est ouverte le week-end et les jours fériés mais elle nécessite une réservation  préalable 2 mois à l'avance (possible via internet).

localizedReview.comments: Very good address with a welcome at the top of Joel and his uncle with permanent smiles and pushing the song from morning to evening. Fantastic views from a typical Canarian home. It feels like home. Joël and his uncle will also bring you all the useful tips to improve your stay and they will also tell you about the life of the past in Masca if you wish. Without hesitation, Masca will remain the best memory of our stay in Tenerife. For your information, the Masca gorge hike is open on weekends and holidays but requires a prior booking 2 months in advance (possible via internet).

comments: Really nice place, in the mountains with the fantastic views. The room is basic, with shared toilet, and old sheets but its a germ to stay like this. Just be careful to leave your car, as we got mugged in the night. They opened the car and took all the things in it. Please don’t leave anything of value

cet endroit est effectivement magique....mais la gentillesse et bonne humeur de Joseito, l'oncle de joel, en font vraiment un endroit exceptionnel !
la terrasse avec cette vue à couper le souffle est top! par contre a part quelques restaurants il n'y a aucune boutique dans le village si vous souhaitez acheter de l'eau ou autres pour randonner. sur recommandation de joel nous avons réserver une table chez riquelme, seul restaurant ouvert le soir.

localizedReview.comments:
this place is indeed magical....but the kindness and good humor of Joseito, Joel's uncle, really make it an exceptional place!
the terrace with this breathtaking view is great! on the other hand apart from a few restaurants there are no shops in the village if you want to buy water or others for hiking. on joel's recommendation we booked a table at riquelme, the only restaurant open in the evening.

comments:
Très jolie maison et super accueil de José.
La vue de la terasse est superbe.
Seul problème, il n'y a pas de fenêtre dans la chambre !

localizedReview.comments:
Very nice house and great welcome from José.
The view from the terrace is superb.
Only problem, there is no window in the room!

comments: Very cosy and peaceful place, the owner is super friendly and helpful :)

Wauw! The town Masca is out of this world and so is the place to stay. Superfriendly welcome, clean room with enough sheets. It's basic but with so much charme from the house, the uncle José and the town our stay was unforgettable! Highly recommend as it is a once in a lifetime stay! Also a very good bar/restaurant Riquelme at 40m from the house! Do not hesitate to book but watch out you don't fall in love too much :)

We loved our stay at Joel’s and Joselito‘s house (who is the uncle of Joel). We received a very warm welcome with local wine and had fun conversations with both Joel and Joselito although we didn’t speak much Spanisch. Joel however speaks English.The room was clean and looked like the pictures show. There is a shared bathroom with warm water. We could also use the fridge. The view from the terrace is amazing and the stars at night are impressive. We had dinner at casa riquelme which is just above the Joel’s house. The food was amazing and traditional but you have to reserve a table in advance. One piece of advice: Park your car on the upper part of the village and get your luggage to the house and afterwards look for a parking spot because the steep stone streets are quite a challenge with suitcases.
If you can, you should definitely have this experience in Masca!
Authentic place, very friendly people

This place is nestled in the most idyllic little spot with great views of Masca!
There a bit of a climb/walk in (10mins), which is something to bear in mind of you are less mobile or have a lot of bags with you. Joel provides really clear directions though!
The restaurant up the mountain, called casa Raquelme, is a must!! It's super cute and offers an authentic canarian set menu. They do not accept walk ins so you must call in advance.
lovely apartment with a spectacular view from the terrace. Jose and Joel are awesome hosts who will provide you with all the info you need to enjoy your stay in Masca.
Nos sentimos muy bien alli, sobre todo con Joselito. Lugar maravilloso y supet bien cuidado

localizedReview.comments: We felt very good there, especially with Joselito. Wonderful place and well cared for

comments: We stayed in two rooms - loved both. :)

We are so lucky we found this place! Joel’s place is in the most beautiful setting in the little village of Masca - if you hire a car make sure you are a confident driver, as the road down to it is narrow and very windy. It’s really quiet and peaceful there. Joel’s uncle was lovely company as well. We really enjoyed ourselves and will be back!
The most quiet place in Tenerife, with the most spectacular view.. And José was wonderful!
Superb!
Superbe rencontre avec l’oncle de joel. L endroit est splendide et l’organisation était parfaite.

localizedReview.comments: Great meeting with Joel's uncle. The place is splendid and the organization was perfect.

comments:
Joel house is something to crave for. Stunning view and a great village with formidable neighbours.
Access to the house is a bit difficult with your suitcases, but never leave anything in the car because our suitcase was stolen from it.
Overall it’s an unique experience to not miss ! And visiting Masca is a must when you’re in Tenerife.
Schöne Lage
Perfect, beautiful place and very very beautiful people !!!!
Posto meraviglioso!

localizedReview.comments: Wonderful place!

comments: Un lugar precioso y tranquilo en el medio de una montaña y pueblito espectaculares! Recomendado :) Joel se comunicò muy bien y su tío José nos acogió.

localizedReview.comments: A beautiful and quiet place in the middle of a spectacular mountain and small town! Recommended :) Joel communicated very well and his uncle José welcomed us.

comments: Wow what an amazing stay! The place was magical and had an incredible view to wake up to. Jose was so lovely and welcoming!
Great host and hospitality, breathtaking view from the accommodation, good place for visitng Maska

Casa humilde ubicada en el paraíso de Masca. Aquí no encontraréis grandes lujos, pero sí un alojamiento aislado y tranquilo con unas vistas privilegiadas. La terraza ofrece unas vistas inmejorables del valle de Masca. La habitación es sencilla pero dispone de todo lo necesario para sobrevivir. Joel estuvo atento antes nuestras dudas sobre Masca y nos recibió su tío Joseito (todo un crack) quien nos dio grandes recomendaciones sobre rutas de senderismo de la zona. Lugar indicado a gente que quiera desconectar y disfrutar de lo que la naturaleza nos ofrece.

localizedReview.comments: Humble house located in the paradise of Masca. You won't find great luxuries here, but you will find a secluded and quiet accommodation with privileged views. The terrace offers unbeatable views of the Masca Valley. The room is simple but has everything you need to survive. Joel was previously attentive to our questions about Masca and was greeted by his uncle Joseito (a crack) who gave us great recommendations on hiking trails in the area. A place for people who want to disconnect and enjoy what nature has to offer.

comments: Wonderful place and amazing host ! Jose is a great soul 🤗
Most beautiful spot I’ve been to. Magic. This is a magic place.
Nous avons passé un moment magique avec José, l’oncle de Joel. Un homme tellement inspirant et avenant… D’autre part le lieu est magique et la vue à couper le souffle. Que d’émerveillement !

localizedReview.comments: We had a magical time with José, Joel's uncle. Such an inspiring and friendly man… On the other hand, the place is magical and the view is breathtaking. What a wonder!

comments: Joel's place is the most magical house we stayed in during our trip on Tenerife. The views are breathtaking, host - really friendly and inspiring and atmosphere unforgetable. I would definitely recommend it to everyone, who is looking for extraordinary place to stay in.

Encantador. Jose es un hombre increíble, un súper anfitrión. Fue un placer compartir parte de nuestro tiempo con el y el resto de la familia. Un sitio con magia y calidez humana!!! Sencillo pero súper-recomendable.

localizedReview.comments: Charming. Jose is an incredible man, a superhost. It was a pleasure sharing some of our time with the and the rest of the family. A place with magic and human warmth!!! Simple but super-recomendable.

comments: Super accueil de la part de José, l'oncle de Joël ! La vue est magnifique, l'ambiance paisible. N'hésitez pas à passer une nuit ici, ça vaut vraiment le coup !

localizedReview.comments: Great hospitality by José, Joel's uncle! The view is beautiful, the atmosphere peaceful. Feel free to spend a night here, it's definitely worth it!

comments: Super séjour aux pieds des montagnes très bien reçu par josé l’oncle de Joël, une chambre simple, mais suffisante pour le séjour et salle de bain partagée précaire mais on retiendra la magnifique vue sur les montagnes ;) endroit atypique

localizedReview.comments: Great stay at the foot of the mountains very well received by Joel's uncle, a single room, but enough for the stay and precarious shared bathroom but we will remember the magnificent view of the mountains;) atypical place

comments: Cudowne miejsce z niesamowitą energią. Gospodarz przesympatyczny, uśmiechnięty i pomocny. Nie chciało się opuszczać tego miejsca. Przepiękny widok o poranku, kawa na tarasie smakuje przewyśmienicie. Z wdzięcznością 💚

localizedReview.comments: A wonderful place with incredible energy. A super friendly host, smiling, and helpful. They didn't want to leave this place. Beautiful view in the morning, coffee on the patio tastes delicious. With gratitude 💚

comments: This place was the highlight of my trip. Breathtaking view from the patio, best night sleep for a long time, and the friendliest of hosts, Joseito.
An absolute gem of a place. Masca is incredible, and this cosy Airbnb was a great place to stay and enjoy the village. Joel & his uncle José were really friendly and welcoming. A brilliant place.
Super cute place in small village Masca. Very sweet and welcoming family.
Amazing location and the sweetest people

Amazing location and very kind people!! Would recommend!
Very friendly and clear communication with advices for the area!  Great spacy place, although for one night, we had a good restful night :)

Joel and his family are great. So kind people. We felt like in home. Beautiful casa. Best way how to see low turistic part of Masca and life there.

Masca has all the charm you hope for and the nature of this valley surrounded by majestic mountains is overwhelming. No better place to enjoy it than at Joel’s. I fell in the hands of the most welcoming family and felt immediately as I belonged. The room breathes authenticty, is very comfortable and the view is amazing. And i had a delicious dinner at Riquelme’s pretty terras. And don’t forget to try a prickley pear/cactus fruit from Hannibal el Biologico!
Un lugar con encanto y muy buena gente

localizedReview.comments: A charming place and very good people

comments: Magnifique endroit. Énormément de charme et des hôtes fort sympathiques ! Un moment magique.

localizedReview.comments: Beautiful place. Lots of charm and very friendly hosts! A magical moment.

comments: La ubicación es única y José su tío se encargó de acogernos y darnos la bienvenida, nos sentimos super agusto. Mi hija pudo investigar y jugar libremente por dentro y fuera de la casa y José nos descubrió la historia del lugar... Un lugar muy especial y con mucho encanto.

localizedReview.comments: The location is unique and José his uncle took care of welcoming us and welcoming us, we felt super comfortable. My daughter was able to investigate and play freely inside and outside the house and José discovered the history of the place... A very special and charming place with a lot of charm.

comments:
Très belle maison, très bien située, avec une vue magnifique donnant sur Masca.
Joël et José sont de super hôtes. Nous avons été très bien accueillies.
Nous conseillons cette adresse à tous ceux qui sont de passage à Masca. Immersion assurée dans la culture canarienne et venezuelienne.

localizedReview.comments:
Very nice house, very well located, with a beautiful view overlooking Masca.
Joël and José are great hosts. We were very well received.
We recommend this place for anyone who is visiting Masca. Immersion assured in the Canarian and Venuelian culture.

comments:

La vue est sublime et le cadre agréable. Attention toutefois, 6-7 minutes de marche sur un sentier caillouteux et très valloné sont nécessaires pour atteindre le logement.
Le prix vaut largement l’endroit, moins la chambre 👍🏼

localizedReview.comments:
Rustic room downstairs is house with the amenities just needed (fridge a little dirty, shower, towels).
The views are sublime and the setting pleasant. Be careful though, 6-7 minutes walk on a very hilly and very hilly are needed to reach the accommodation.
The price is well worth the place, minus the room 👍🏼

comments: Joel place is amazing! So unique experience to visit Masca village and sleep over there. The accommodation, hosting and people around made us feel calm and peaceful. It was one of the best Airbnb we ever visited! Highly recommended for anyone! Many thanks for Joel and his uncle for hosting us! For sure we gonna come back in a future!:)
Gracias!

localizedReview.comments: Thank you!

comments: Todo estaba bien, el lugar es muy bonito, gracias por la acogedora bienvenida

localizedReview.comments: Everything was fine, the place is very beautiful, thanks for the cozy welcome

comments: Lovely home atmosphere in a great location. Perfect communication with the host. Recommended!
Un endroit magique hors du temps ! Joël et José sont adorables, le cœur sur la main ! On ne peut que fortement recommandé !

localizedReview.comments: A magical timeless place! Joël and José are adorable, heart on hand! We can only highly recommend it!

comments: A unique & gorgeous place where time stands still, hosted by amazing people... Breath-taking location. Thank you so much !

Our 2 nights stay at Joel’s was just great. The view from his terrace is probably one of the best you can get in Tenerife.
His uncle and him welcomed us with some local wine. Their place is a few steps away from Riquelme - great restaurant in Masca.
I definitely recommend to stay at Joel’s to enjoy Masca to the fullest.
Paradise stay in this gem that is Masca. Thank you for having me, will definitely recommend 💛
Excelente comunicación

localizedReview.comments: Excelente communication

comments: Muy acogedor y con unas vistas impresionantes. Estuvimos muy a gusto, volveremos.

localizedReview.comments: Very cozy and with a breathtaking view. We were very pleased, we will be back.

comments: War eine schöne Zeit

localizedReview.comments: Was a lovely time

comments: Lugar de cuento de hadas...maravilloso!!! Estancia perfecta. Estilo retro pero acogedor, como si estuvieras en casa. Joel un gran anfitrión y su tío Joseito muy amable y cercano. Tuvimos el placer de compartir con el un ratito por la noche contando historias del lugar... como un familiar mas. Volveremos!! 100%

localizedReview.comments: Fairytale place...wonderful!!! Perfect stay. Retro but cozy style, as if you were at home. Joel a great host and his uncle Joseito is very friendly and close. We had the pleasure of sharing with the last night in the evening telling stories of the place... like a family member. We'll be back!! 100%

comments: Great room in a lovely place!
Posto magico e posizione spettacolare! Esperienza incredibile da fare assolutamente

localizedReview.comments: Magical place and spectacular location! Incredible experience to do absolutely

comments: Amazing experience with Joel, he showed us around the beautiful Masca area and took us to amazing local restaurants and places.

The location and views are absolutely unreal - the house is perched on a mountain ridge, and you see the sun set through the gorge, over the ocean and the next island. Pro tip: have dinner at Casa Riquelme, 5 minutes away - the food was amazing.

A pesar del mal tiempo ha sido encantador quedarnos una noche en este lugar tan magico y en particular en casa de Joel. Nos acogiò Joseito y fue un encuentro muy bonito, es una persona muy acogedora y muy buena, nos encantò compartir un rato con el. Joel ha sido muy disponible, flexible y contestò rapidamente a todas mis dudas y preguntas. Ademas me ayudò a encontrar un sitio (encantador!) para cenar.
La habitacion està bien, tiene su baño proprio. La unica penita es que no tenga ventana que mire hacia afuera.
Yo volverìa sin duda y se lo recomiendo!!!

localizedReview.comments:
Despite the bad weather it was lovely to stay one night at this magical place and in particular at Joel's home. We were welcomed by Joseito and it was a very nice meeting, he is a very welcoming and very good person, we loved sharing a time with him. Joel has been very helpful, flexible and was quick to answer all my questions and concerns. Also, she helped me find a place (lovely!) for dinner.
The room is fine, it has its own bathroom. The only penny is that I don't have a window looking out.
I would definitely come back and recommend it!!!

comments:
Wonderful time and great memories with Joel, Jose and friends! The view from the house is amazing.
We definitely recommend to eat at the restaurant Casa Requelme 20m from their place, amazing food!
I will never forget the dawn at Joel's apartment as the  colours and shapes emerged from the darkness on the cliffs on the other side of the ravine.

Amazing place!
Nice view, local tips, lots of stories to share and a good help to guide you to the best place to eat: the restaurant just above ;)
Joel is such a nice guy. Polite person which is living at most beautifull place on the Island. I reall recomend to go to Joel’s place and spend some great time in Masca.

The house and surroundings are beautiful, even breathtaking.
Communication with host was good and fast.
We experienced difficulties with arriving to the property, as it requires you to leave your car up on the main road and walk down a steep slope. with our suitcases at night time, it was a bit of a nightmare and made our arrival very exhausting.
The room is nice, however beds were surprisingly old and uncomfortable.
unfortunately the kitchen was very dirty - though the host communicated that. I would suggest the host that in the absence of a functioning kitchen, to have basic facilities for boiling water and making tea/coffee/soup.

It was really really nice at Joels place. We didn't meet Joel in person but his uncle (I think Juan) was there and he was so nice. Even if we didn't speak Spanish we could have nice conversations somehow and he helped us with everything. We had our babydaughter with us and he was really nice to her. Thanks to Juan again for his really kind, open and so warm hospitality.
The house is located in an amazing place. The hills, the plants, the view at the sea... it is just overwhelming. Everything was clean and comfortable. We enjoyed the hammock and the Terrasse.
Even if we had to check out at 12 it was no problem to stay 1 hour longer cause the baby slept.
We would always come back!
Thanks for everything. You are so lucky to live in beautiful Masca.
See you next time :)

Se agradece la dedicación y atención al visitante, compartir su casa con el que llega considero que es un valor añadido. Buena gente en rincones mágicos, encantado con la estancia, charla y risas en un ambiente familiar que no se paga con dinero.

localizedReview.comments: Thank you for your dedication and attention to the visitor, sharing your home with whom you arrive. I think it's an added value. Good people in magical corners, delighted with the stay, chat and laughs in a family atmosphere that is not paid with money.

comments: Great place with a stunning view. Best hospitality and a must for everyone who wants to stay away from all the noise and rush of today.

Joel's place was amazing! We came tired and left very relaxed. Jose, who received us is a lovely man with a big heart, we had a good chat too. He recommended us cool places, like Riquelme's restaurant with awesome view and the owners guitar songs :) The rooms are new, clean and nicely decorated. Thank you very much!

Above and beyond all expectations. The pictures don't do the place justice as it is much more beautiful than can be captured. On top of everything Joel was an amazing host who gave us great local tips and hiked with us off the beaten track. Can't recommend this place high enough!

Joël et son oncle nous ont accueilli comme de la famille nous n'avons pas été déçu à la lecture des commentaires précédents si vous souhaitez une expérience unique en partageant un moment d'intimité insulaire alors cette Casa Rural et l'endroit où il faut résider durant son séjour

localizedReview.comments: Joël and his uncle welcomed us as family. We were not disappointed when reading previous reviews if you wanted a unique experience by sharing a moment of island privacy then this Casa Rural and the place to stay during their stay.

comments: Dieser Ort ist unbeschreiblich schön und der Abend sowie der Morgen bereiten einfach Freude dort. Ein toller Gastgeber mit dem wir gerne den Abend am Feuer verbracht haben.

localizedReview.comments: This place is indescribably beautiful and the evening as well as the morning just bring joy there. A great host with whom we loved to spend the evening by the fire.

comments:
Super Accueil .
Très agréable séjours.

localizedReview.comments:
Great welcome .
Very pleasant stays.

comments: A great hidden place with realy kind people.

Joel responde muy rápido y el proceso de llegada correcto. Aunque él no se encontraba en la casa, su tío - una gran persona - se encargó de que todo estuviera bien de forma muy amigable, cercana y respetuosa.
Gran gente para un gran lugar.

localizedReview.comments:
Joel responds very quickly and the check-in process is correct. Although he wasn't in the house, his uncle - a great person - made sure everything was fine, very friendly, close, and respectful.
Great people for a great place.

comments: En La casa de Joel es como un libro que empezamos pero que cada pagina tenía su propio magia y que no podemos terminar. La totalidad de mi viaje en este lugar, con el, sus amigos y su familia fue como una chispa entre nosotros. Muchas gracias para todo. Me voy a recordar este momento en ma memoria por mucho tiempo.

localizedReview.comments: At Joel's house it's like a book we started but each page had its own magic and that we can't finish. My whole trip to this place, with him, his friends and family was like a spark between us. Thank you very much for everything. I'm going to remember this moment in memory for a long time.

comments: Wir haben in Joels Wohnung eine Nacht übernachtet. Wunderschön fanden wir die Ausblicke in das Tal. Joel war ein netter und bemühter Gastgeber , hat uns beim Ankunft Tee angeboten und gezeigt, wo wir am Abend essen gehen können. Das kleine Häuschen teilt man mit seinem älteren Familienmitglied. Das Zimmer ist klein und einfach ausgestattet, uns war kalt in der Nacht, die Decken reichten uns im Dezember nicht aus und die Betten waren nicht ganz bequem, aber die Schönheit des Dorfes hat alle die Unbequemlichkeiten gut gemacht. Es gab eine saubere Toilette mit einer Dusche mit warmen Wasser, die man mit Joels Opa teilt.  Das Häuschen ist renoviert. Am Abend ist es sehr still in dem Ort, wir haben die Stille genossen, fanden es nur schade, dass das Fernseher an und ziemlich laut war. Das Zimmer hat kein Fenster. Es gibt eine gemeinsame nette  Terasse.

localizedReview.comments: We stayed one night in Joel's apartment. Beautiful we found the views into the valley. Joel was a nice and eager host , offered us tea upon arrival and showed us where to eat in the evening. The little cottage is shared with its older family member. The room is small and simply equipped, we were cold at night, the blankets were not enough for us in December and the beds were not quite comfortable, but the beauty of the village was all the inconvenience good. There was a clean toilet with a shower with warm water to be shared with Joel's grandpa.  The cottage is renovated. In the evening it is very quiet in the place, we enjoyed the silence, it was just a shame that the TV was on and quite noisy. Room doesn't have a window. There is a common nice  terrace.

comments: Ottima stanza in un luogo unico al mondo. Meravigliosa l'ospitalità di Joel. Molto consigliato

localizedReview.comments: Great room in a unique place in the world. Wonderful hospitality from Joel. Highly recommended

comments: Joel will accept you as friend, more than a host. So whether you want to find out 'secret' places od the area, drink a večer together or just spent time for yourself... The space itself and the location are simply amazing, either you are looking for magical sunset, or calmful ambient, you would find it there.
